                     <div class="line">Being unprepared,</div>
                     <div class="line">Our will became the servant to defect;</div>
                     <div class="line">Which else should free have wrought.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                     <div class="line">All's well.</div>
                     <div class="line">I dreamt last night of the three weird sisters:</div>
                     <div class="line">To you they have show'd some truth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">I think not of them:</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet, when we can entreat an hour to serve,</div>
                     <div class="line">We would spend it in some words upon that business,</div>
                     <div class="line">If you would grant the time.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                     <div class="line">At your kind'st leisure.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">If you shall cleave to my consent, when 'tis,</div>
                     <div class="line">It shall make honour for you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                     <div class="line">So I lose none</div>
                     <div class="line">In seeking to augment it, but still keep</div>
                     <div class="line">My bosom franchised and allegiance clear,</div>
                     <div class="line">I shall be counsell'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Good repose the while!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                     <div class="line">Thanks, sir: the like to you!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt BANQUO and FLEANCE</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Go bid thy mistress, when my drink is ready,</div>
                     <div class="line">She strike upon the bell. Get thee to bed.</div>
                     <p>Exit Servant</p>
                     <div class="line">Is this a dagger which I see before me,</div>
                     <div class="line">The handle toward my hand? Come, let me clutch thee.</div>
                     <div class="line">I have thee not, and yet I see thee still.</div>
                     <div class="line">Art thou not, fatal vision, sensible</div>
                     <div class="line">To feeling as to sight? or art thou but</div>
                     <div class="line">A dagger of the mind, a false creation,</div>
                     <div class="line">Proceeding from the heat-oppressed brain?</div>
                     <div class="line">I see thee yet, in form as palpable</div>
                     <div class="line">As this which now I draw.</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou marshall'st me the way that I was going;</div>
                     <div class="line">And such an instrument I was to use.</div>
                     <div class="line">Mine eyes are made the fools o' the other senses,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or else worth all the rest; I see thee still,</div>
                     <div class="line">And on thy blade and dudgeon gouts of blood,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which was not so before. There's no such thing:</div>
                     <div class="line">It is the bloody business which informs</div>
                     <div class="line">Thus to mine eyes. Now o'er the one halfworld</div>
                     <div class="line">Nature seems dead, and wicked dreams abuse</div>
                     <div class="line">The curtain'd sleep; witchcraft celebrates</div>
                     <div class="line">Pale Hecate's offerings, and wither'd murder,</div>
                     <div class="line">Alarum'd by his sentinel, the wolf,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose howl's his watch, thus with his stealthy pace.</div>
                     <div class="line">With Tarquin's ravishing strides, towards his design</div>
                     <div class="line">Moves like a ghost. Thou sure and firm-set earth,</div>
                     <div class="line">Hear not my steps, which way they walk, for fear</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy very stones prate of my whereabout,</div>
                     <div class="line">And take the present horror from the time,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which now suits with it. Whiles I threat, he lives:</div>
                     <div class="line">Words to the heat of deeds too cold breath gives.</div>
                     <p>A bell rings</p>
                     <div class="line">I go, and it is done; the bell invites me.</div>
                     <div class="line">Hear it not, Duncan; for it is a knell</div>
                     <div class="line">That summons thee to heaven or to hell.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.4.3">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>2. SCENE II.  The same.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter LADY MACBETH</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">That which hath made them drunk hath made me bold;</div>
                     <div class="line">What hath quench'd them hath given me fire.</div>
                     <div class="line">Hark! Peace!</div>
                     <div class="line">It was the owl that shriek'd, the fatal bellman,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which gives the stern'st good-night. He is about it:</div>
                     <div class="line">The doors are open; and the surfeited grooms</div>
                     <div class="line">Do mock their charge with snores: I have drugg'd</div>
                     <div class="line">their possets,</div>
                     <div class="line">That death and nature do contend about them,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whether they live or die.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Within</span>  Who's there? what, ho!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Alack, I am afraid they have awaked,</div>
                     <div class="line">And 'tis not done. The attempt and not the deed</div>
                     <div class="line">Confounds us. Hark! I laid their daggers ready;</div>
                     <div class="line">He could not miss 'em. Had he not resembled</div>
                     <div class="line">My father as he slept, I had done't.</div>
                     <p>Enter MACBETH</p>
                     <div class="line">My husband!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">I have done the deed. Didst thou not hear a noise?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">I heard the owl scream and the crickets cry.</div>
                     <div class="line">Did not you speak?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">When?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Now.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">As I descended?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Hark!</div>
                     <div class="line">Who lies i' the second chamber?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Donalbain.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">This is a sorry sight.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Looking on his hands</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">A foolish thought, to say a sorry sight.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">There's one did laugh in's sleep, and one cried</div>
                     <div class="line">'Murder!'</div>
                     <div class="line">That they did wake each other: I stood and heard them:</div>
                     <div class="line">But they did say their prayers, and address'd them</div>
                     <div class="line">Again to sleep.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">There are two lodged together.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">One cried 'God bless us!' and 'Amen' the other;</div>
                     <div class="line">As they had seen me with these hangman's hands.</div>
                     <div class="line">Listening their fear, I could not say 'Amen,'</div>
                     <div class="line">When they did say 'God bless us!'</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Consider it not so deeply.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">But wherefore could not I pronounce 'Amen'?</div>
                     <div class="line">I had most need of blessing, and 'Amen'</div>
                     <div class="line">Stuck in my throat.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">These deeds must not be thought</div>
                     <div class="line">After these ways; so, it will make us mad.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Methought I heard a voice cry 'Sleep no more!</div>
                     <div class="line">Macbeth does murder sleep', the innocent sleep,</div>
                     <div class="line">Sleep that knits up the ravell'd sleeve of care,</div>
                     <div class="line">The death of each day's life, sore labour's bath,</div>
                     <div class="line">Balm of hurt minds, great nature's second course,</div>
                     <div class="line">Chief nourisher in life's feast,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">What do you mean?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Still it cried 'Sleep no more!' to all the house:</div>
                     <div class="line">'Glamis hath murder'd sleep, and therefore Cawdor</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall sleep no more; Macbeth shall sleep no more.'</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Who was it that thus cried? Why, worthy thane,</div>
                     <div class="line">You do unbend your noble strength, to think</div>
                     <div class="line">So brainsickly of things. Go get some water,</div>
                     <div class="line">And wash this filthy witness from your hand.</div>
                     <div class="line">Why did you bring these daggers from the place?</div>
                     <div class="line">They must lie there: go carry them; and smear</div>
                     <div class="line">The sleepy grooms with blood.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll go no more:</div>
                     <div class="line">I am afraid to think what I have done;</div>
                     <div class="line">Look on't again I dare not.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Infirm of purpose!</div>
                     <div class="line">Give me the daggers: the sleeping and the dead</div>
                     <div class="line">Are but as pictures: 'tis the eye of childhood</div>
                     <div class="line">That fears a painted devil. If he do bleed,</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll gild the faces of the grooms withal;</div>
                     <div class="line">For it must seem their guilt.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit. Knocking within</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Whence is that knocking?</div>
                     <div class="line">How is't with me, when every noise appals me?</div>
                     <div class="line">What hands are here? ha! they pluck out mine eyes.</div>
                     <div class="line">Will all great Neptune's ocean wash this blood</div>
                     <div class="line">Clean from my hand? No, this my hand will rather</div>
                     <div class="line">The multitudinous seas in incarnadine,</div>
                     <div class="line">Making the green one red.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter LADY MACBETH</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">My hands are of your colour; but I shame</div>
                     <div class="line">To wear a heart so white.</div>
                     <p>Knocking within</p>
                     <div class="line">I hear a knocking</div>
                     <div class="line">At the south entry: retire we to our chamber;</div>
                     <div class="line">A little water clears us of this deed:</div>
                     <div class="line">How easy is it, then! Your constancy</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath left you unattended.</div>
                     <p>Knocking within</p>
                     <div class="line">Hark! more knocking.</div>
                     <div class="line">Get on your nightgown, lest occasion call us,</div>
                     <div class="line">And show us to be watchers. Be not lost</div>
                     <div class="line">So poorly in your thoughts.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">To know my deed, 'twere best not know myself.</div>
                     <p>Knocking within</p>
                     <div class="line">Wake Duncan with thy knocking! I would thou couldst!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.4.4">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>3. SCENE III.  The same.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Knocking within. Enter a Porter</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Porter</div>
                     <div class="line">Here's a knocking indeed! If a</div>
                     <div class="line">man were porter of hell-gate, he should have</div>
                     <div class="line">old turning the key.</div>
                     <p>Knocking within</p>
                     <div class="line">Knock,</div>
                     <div class="line">knock, knock! Who's there, i' the name of</div>
                     <div class="line">Beelzebub? Here's a farmer, that hanged</div>
                     <div class="line">himself on the expectation of plenty: come in</div>
                     <div class="line">time; have napkins enow about you; here</div>
                     <div class="line">you'll sweat for't.</div>
                     <p>Knocking within</p>
                     <div class="line">Knock,</div>
                     <div class="line">knock! Who's there, in the other devil's</div>
                     <div class="line">name? Faith, here's an equivocator, that could</div>
                     <div class="line">swear in both the scales against either scale;</div>
                     <div class="line">who committed treason enough for God's sake,</div>
                     <div class="line">yet could not equivocate to heaven: O, come</div>
                     <div class="line">in, equivocator.</div>
                     <p>Knocking within</p>
                     <div class="line">Knock,</div>
                     <div class="line">knock, knock! Who's there? Faith, here's an</div>
                     <div class="line">English tailor come hither, for stealing out of</div>
                     <div class="line">a French hose: come in, tailor; here you may</div>
                     <div class="line">roast your goose.</div>
                     <p>Knocking within</p>
                     <div class="line">Knock,</div>
                     <div class="line">knock; never at quiet! What are you? But</div>
                     <div class="line">this place is too cold for hell. I'll devil-porter</div>
                     <div class="line">it no further: I had thought to have let in</div>
                     <div class="line">some of all professions that go the primrose</div>
                     <div class="line">way to the everlasting bonfire.</div>
                     <p>Knocking within</p>
                     <div class="line">Anon, anon! I pray you, remember the porter.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Opens the gate</p>
               <p>Enter MACDUFF and LENNOX</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Was it so late, friend, ere you went to bed,</div>
                     <div class="line">That you do lie so late?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Porter</div>
                     <div class="line">'Faith sir, we were carousing till the</div>
                     <div class="line">second cock: and drink, sir, is a great</div>
                     <div class="line">provoker of three things.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">What three things does drink especially provoke?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Porter</div>
                     <div class="line">Marry, sir, nose-painting, sleep, and</div>
                     <div class="line">urine. Lechery, sir, it provokes, and unprovokes;</div>
                     <div class="line">it provokes the desire, but it takes</div>
                     <div class="line">away the performance: therefore, much drink</div>
                     <div class="line">may be said to be an equivocator with lechery:</div>
                     <div class="line">it makes him, and it mars him; it sets</div>
                     <div class="line">him on, and it takes him off; it persuades him,</div>
                     <div class="line">and disheartens him; makes him stand to, and</div>
                     <div class="line">not stand to; in conclusion, equivocates him</div>
                     <div class="line">in a sleep, and, giving him the lie, leaves him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">I believe drink gave thee the lie last night.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Porter</div>
                     <div class="line">That it did, sir, i' the very throat on</div>
                     <div class="line">me: but I requited him for his lie; and, I</div>
                     <div class="line">think, being too strong for him, though he took</div>
                     <div class="line">up my legs sometime, yet I made a shift to cast</div>
                     <div class="line">him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Is thy master stirring?</div>
                     <p>Enter MACBETH</p>
                     <div class="line">Our knocking has awaked him; here he comes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                     <div class="line">Good morrow, noble sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Good morrow, both.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Is the king stirring, worthy thane?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Not yet.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">He did command me to call timely on him:</div>
                     <div class="line">I have almost slipp'd the hour.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll bring you to him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">I know this is a joyful trouble to you;</div>
                     <div class="line">But yet 'tis one.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">The labour we delight in physics pain.</div>
                     <div class="line">This is the door.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll make so bold to call,</div>
                     <div class="line">For 'tis my limited service.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                     <div class="line">Goes the king hence to-day?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">He does: he did appoint so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                     <div class="line">The night has been unruly: where we lay,</div>
                     <div class="line">Our chimneys were blown down; and, as they say,</div>
                     <div class="line">Lamentings heard i' the air; strange screams of death,</div>
                     <div class="line">And prophesying with accents terrible</div>
                     <div class="line">Of dire combustion and confused events</div>
                     <div class="line">New hatch'd to the woeful time: the obscure bird</div>
                     <div class="line">Clamour'd the livelong night: some say, the earth</div>
                     <div class="line">Was feverous and did shake.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">'Twas a rough night.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                     <div class="line">My young remembrance cannot parallel</div>
                     <div class="line">A fellow to it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter MACDUFF</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">O horror, horror, horror! Tongue nor heart</div>
                     <div class="line">Cannot conceive nor name thee!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                     <div class="line">What's the matter.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Confusion now hath made his masterpiece!</div>
                     <div class="line">Most sacrilegious murder hath broke ope</div>
                     <div class="line">The Lord's anointed temple, and stole thence</div>
                     <div class="line">The life o' the building!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">What is 't you say? the life?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                     <div class="line">Mean you his majesty?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Approach the chamber, and destroy your sight</div>
                     <div class="line">With a new Gorgon: do not bid me speak;</div>
                     <div class="line">See, and then speak yourselves.</div>
                     <p>Exeunt MACBETH and LENNOX</p>
                     <div class="line">Awake, awake!</div>
                     <div class="line">Ring the alarum-bell. Murder and treason!</div>
                     <div class="line">Banquo and Donalbain! Malcolm! awake!</div>
                     <div class="line">Shake off this downy sleep, death's counterfeit,</div>
                     <div class="line">And look on death itself! up, up, and see</div>
                     <div class="line">The great doom's image! Malcolm! Banquo!</div>
                     <div class="line">As from your graves rise up, and walk like sprites,</div>
                     <div class="line">To countenance this horror! Ring the bell.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Bell rings</p>
               <p>Enter LADY MACBETH</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">What's the business,</div>
                     <div class="line">That such a hideous trumpet calls to parley</div>
                     <div class="line">The sleepers of the house? speak, speak!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">O gentle lady,</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis not for you to hear what I can speak:</div>
                     <div class="line">The repetition, in a woman's ear,</div>
                     <div class="line">Would murder as it fell.</div>
                     <p>Enter BANQUO</p>
                     <div class="line">O Banquo, Banquo,</div>
                     <div class="line">Our royal master 's murder'd!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Woe, alas!</div>
                     <div class="line">What, in our house?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                     <div class="line">Too cruel any where.</div>
                     <div class="line">Dear Duff, I prithee, contradict thyself,</div>
                     <div class="line">And say it is not so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter MACBETH and LENNOX, with ROSS</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Had I but died an hour before this chance,</div>
                     <div class="line">I had lived a blessed time; for, from this instant,</div>
                     <div class="line">There 's nothing serious in mortality:</div>
                     <div class="line">All is but toys: renown and grace is dead;</div>
                     <div class="line">The wine of life is drawn, and the mere lees</div>
                     <div class="line">Is left this vault to brag of.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter MALCOLM and DONALBAIN</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DONALBAIN</div>
                     <div class="line">What is amiss?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">You are, and do not know't:</div>
                     <div class="line">The spring, the head, the fountain of your blood</div>
                     <div class="line">Is stopp'd; the very source of it is stopp'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Your royal father 's murder'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">O, by whom?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                     <div class="line">Those of his chamber, as it seem'd, had done 't:</div>
                     <div class="line">Their hands and faces were an badged with blood;</div>
                     <div class="line">So were their daggers, which unwiped we found</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon their pillows:</div>
                     <div class="line">They stared, and were distracted; no man's life</div>
                     <div class="line">Was to be trusted with them.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">O, yet I do repent me of my fury,</div>
                     <div class="line">That I did kill them.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Wherefore did you so?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Who can be wise, amazed, temperate and furious,</div>
                     <div class="line">Loyal and neutral, in a moment? No man:</div>
                     <div class="line">The expedition my violent love</div>
                     <div class="line">Outrun the pauser, reason. Here lay Duncan,</div>
                     <div class="line">His silver skin laced with his golden blood;</div>
                     <div class="line">And his gash'd stabs look'd like a breach in nature</div>
                     <div class="line">For ruin's wasteful entrance: there, the murderers,</div>
                     <div class="line">Steep'd in the colours of their trade, their daggers</div>
                     <div class="line">Unmannerly breech'd with gore: who could refrain,</div>
                     <div class="line">That had a heart to love, and in that heart</div>
                     <div class="line">Courage to make 's love known?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Help me hence, ho!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Look to the lady.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to DONALBAIN</span>  Why do we hold our tongues,</div>
                     <div class="line">That most may claim this argument for ours?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DONALBAIN</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to MALCOLM</span>  What should be spoken here,</div>
                     <div class="line">where our fate,</div>
                     <div class="line">Hid in an auger-hole, may rush, and seize us?</div>
                     <div class="line">Let 's away;</div>
                     <div class="line">Our tears are not yet brew'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to DONALBAIN</span>        Nor our strong sorrow</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon the foot of motion.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                     <div class="line">Look to the lady:</div>
                     <p>LADY MACBETH is carried out</p>
                     <div class="line">And when we have our naked frailties hid,</div>
                     <div class="line">That suffer in exposure, let us meet,</div>
                     <div class="line">And question this most bloody piece of work,</div>
                     <div class="line">To know it further. Fears and scruples shake us:</div>
                     <div class="line">In the great hand of God I stand; and thence</div>
                     <div class="line">Against the undivulged pretence I fight</div>
                     <div class="line">Of treasonous malice.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">And so do I.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALL</div>
                     <div class="line">So all.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Let's briefly put on manly readiness,</div>
                     <div class="line">And meet i' the hall together.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALL</div>
                     <div class="line">Well contented.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt all but Malcolm and Donalbain</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">What will you do? Let's not consort with them:</div>
                     <div class="line">To show an unfelt sorrow is an office</div>
                     <div class="line">Which the false man does easy. I'll to England.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DONALBAIN</div>
                     <div class="line">To Ireland, I; our separated fortune</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall keep us both the safer: where we are,</div>
                     <div class="line">There's daggers in men's smiles: the near in blood,</div>
                     <div class="line">The nearer bloody.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">This murderous shaft that's shot</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath not yet lighted, and our safest way</div>
                     <div class="line">Is to avoid the aim. Therefore, to horse;</div>
                     <div class="line">And let us not be dainty of leave-taking,</div>
                     <div class="line">But shift away: there's warrant in that theft</div>
                     <div class="line">Which steals itself, when there's no mercy left.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.4.5">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>4. SCENE IV.  Outside Macbeth's castle.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter ROSS and an old Man</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Old Man</div>
                     <div class="line">Threescore and ten I can remember well:</div>
                     <div class="line">Within the volume of which time I have seen</div>
                     <div class="line">Hours dreadful and things strange; but this sore night</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath trifled former knowings.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                     <div class="line">Ah, good father,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou seest, the heavens, as troubled with man's act,</div>
                     <div class="line">Threaten his bloody stage: by the clock, 'tis day,</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet dark night strangles the travelling lamp:</div>
                     <div class="line">Is't night's predominance, or the day's shame,</div>
                     <div class="line">That darkness does the face of earth entomb,</div>
                     <div class="line">When living light should kiss it?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Old Man</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis unnatural,</div>
                     <div class="line">Even like the deed that's done. On Tuesday last,</div>
                     <div class="line">A falcon, towering in her pride of place,</div>
                     <div class="line">Was by a mousing owl hawk'd at and kill'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                     <div class="line">And Duncan's horses--a thing most strange and certain--</div>
                     <div class="line">Beauteous and swift, the minions of their race,</div>
                     <div class="line">Turn'd wild in nature, broke their stalls, flung out,</div>
                     <div class="line">Contending 'gainst obedience, as they would make</div>
                     <div class="line">War with mankind.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Old Man</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis said they eat each other.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                     <div class="line">They did so, to the amazement of mine eyes</div>
                     <div class="line">That look'd upon't. Here comes the good Macduff.</div>
                     <p>Enter MACDUFF</p>
                     <div class="line">How goes the world, sir, now?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, see you not?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                     <div class="line">Is't known who did this more than bloody deed?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Those that Macbeth hath slain.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas, the day!</div>
                     <div class="line">What good could they pretend?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">They were suborn'd:</div>
                     <div class="line">Malcolm and Donalbain, the king's two sons,</div>
                     <div class="line">Are stol'n away and fled; which puts upon them</div>
                     <div class="line">Suspicion of the deed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                     <div class="line">'Gainst nature still!</div>
                     <div class="line">Thriftless ambition, that wilt ravin up</div>
                     <div class="line">Thine own life's means! Then 'tis most like</div>
                     <div class="line">The sovereignty will fall upon Macbeth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">He is already named, and gone to Scone</div>
                     <div class="line">To be invested.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                     <div class="line">Where is Duncan's body?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Carried to Colmekill,</div>
                     <div class="line">The sacred storehouse of his predecessors,</div>
                     <div class="line">And guardian of their bones.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                     <div class="line">Will you to Scone?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">No, cousin, I'll to Fife.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, I will thither.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, may you see things well done there: adieu!</div>
                     <div class="line">Lest our old robes sit easier than our new!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                     <div class="line">Farewell, father.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Old Man</div>
                     <div class="line">God's benison go with you; and with those</div>
                     <div class="line">That would make good of bad, and friends of foes!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
         </article>
         <article class="chapter" id="R.1.5">
            <header class="chapter-titlepage">
               <h2>Chapter 3. ACT III</h2>
            </header>
            <div class="lists-of-titles">
               <div class="toc">
                  <p>
                     <b>Table of Contents</b>
                  </p>
                  <ul class="toc">
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.5.2">1. SCENE I.  Forres. The palace.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.5.3">2. SCENE II.  The palace.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.5.4">3. SCENE III.  A park near the palace.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.5.5">4. SCENE IV.  The same. Hall in the palace.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.5.6">5. SCENE V.  A Heath.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.5.7">6. SCENE VI.  Forres. The palace.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                  </ul>
               </div>
            </div>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.5.2">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>1. SCENE I.  Forres. The palace.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter BANQUO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou hast it now: king, Cawdor, Glamis, all,</div>
                     <div class="line">As the weird women promised, and, I fear,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou play'dst most foully for't: yet it was said</div>
                     <div class="line">It should not stand in thy posterity,</div>
                     <div class="line">But that myself should be the root and father</div>
                     <div class="line">Of many kings. If there come truth from them--</div>
                     <div class="line">As upon thee, Macbeth, their speeches shine--</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, by the verities on thee made good,</div>
                     <div class="line">May they not be my oracles as well,</div>
                     <div class="line">And set me up in hope? But hush! no more.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Sennet sounded. Enter MACBETH, as king, LADY
MACBETH, as queen, LENNOX, ROSS, Lords, Ladies, and
Attendants</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Here's our chief guest.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">If he had been forgotten,</div>
                     <div class="line">It had been as a gap in our great feast,</div>
                     <div class="line">And all-thing unbecoming.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">To-night we hold a solemn supper sir,</div>
                     <div class="line">And I'll request your presence.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                     <div class="line">Let your highness</div>
                     <div class="line">Command upon me; to the which my duties</div>
                     <div class="line">Are with a most indissoluble tie</div>
                     <div class="line">For ever knit.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Ride you this afternoon?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, my good lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">We should have else desired your good advice,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which still hath been both grave and prosperous,</div>
                     <div class="line">In this day's council; but we'll take to-morrow.</div>
                     <div class="line">Is't far you ride?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                     <div class="line">As far, my lord, as will fill up the time</div>
                     <div class="line">'Twixt this and supper: go not my horse the better,</div>
                     <div class="line">I must become a borrower of the night</div>
                     <div class="line">For a dark hour or twain.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Fail not our feast.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                     <div class="line">My lord, I will not.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">We hear, our bloody cousins are bestow'd</div>
                     <div class="line">In England and in Ireland, not confessing</div>
                     <div class="line">Their cruel parricide, filling their hearers</div>
                     <div class="line">With strange invention: but of that to-morrow,</div>
                     <div class="line">When therewithal we shall have cause of state</div>
                     <div class="line">Craving us jointly. Hie you to horse: adieu,</div>
                     <div class="line">Till you return at night. Goes Fleance with you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, my good lord: our time does call upon 's.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">I wish your horses swift and sure of foot;</div>
                     <div class="line">And so I do commend you to their backs. Farewell.</div>
                     <p>Exit BANQUO</p>
                     <div class="line">Let every man be master of his time</div>
                     <div class="line">Till seven at night: to make society</div>
                     <div class="line">The sweeter welcome, we will keep ourself</div>
                     <div class="line">Till supper-time alone: while then, God be with you!</div>
                     <p>Exeunt all but MACBETH, and an attendant</p>
                     <div class="line">Sirrah, a word with you: attend those men</div>
                     <div class="line">Our pleasure?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ATTENDANT</div>
                     <div class="line">They are, my lord, without the palace gate.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Bring them before us.</div>
                     <p>Exit Attendant</p>
                     <div class="line">To be thus is nothing;</div>
                     <div class="line">But to be safely thus.--Our fears in Banquo</div>
                     <div class="line">Stick deep; and in his royalty of nature</div>
                     <div class="line">Reigns that which would be fear'd: 'tis much he dares;</div>
                     <div class="line">And, to that dauntless temper of his mind,</div>
                     <div class="line">He hath a wisdom that doth guide his valour</div>
                     <div class="line">To act in safety. There is none but he</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose being I do fear: and, under him,</div>
                     <div class="line">My Genius is rebuked; as, it is said,</div>
                     <div class="line">Mark Antony's was by Caesar. He chid the sisters</div>
                     <div class="line">When first they put the name of king upon me,</div>
                     <div class="line">And bade them speak to him: then prophet-like</div>
                     <div class="line">They hail'd him father to a line of kings:</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon my head they placed a fruitless crown,</div>
                     <div class="line">And put a barren sceptre in my gripe,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thence to be wrench'd with an unlineal hand,</div>
                     <div class="line">No son of mine succeeding. If 't be so,</div>
                     <div class="line">For Banquo's issue have I filed my mind;</div>
                     <div class="line">For them the gracious Duncan have I murder'd;</div>
                     <div class="line">Put rancours in the vessel of my peace</div>
                     <div class="line">Only for them; and mine eternal jewel</div>
                     <div class="line">Given to the common enemy of man,</div>
                     <div class="line">To make them kings, the seed of Banquo kings!</div>
                     <div class="line">Rather than so, come fate into the list.</div>
                     <div class="line">And champion me to the utterance! Who's there!</div>
                     <p>Re-enter Attendant, with two Murderers</p>
                     <div class="line">Now go to the door, and stay there till we call.</div>
                     <p>Exit Attendant</p>
                     <div class="line">Was it not yesterday we spoke together?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                     <div class="line">It was, so please your highness.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Well then, now</div>
                     <div class="line">Have you consider'd of my speeches? Know</div>
                     <div class="line">That it was he in the times past which held you</div>
                     <div class="line">So under fortune, which you thought had been</div>
                     <div class="line">Our innocent self: this I made good to you</div>
                     <div class="line">In our last conference, pass'd in probation with you,</div>
                     <div class="line">How you were borne in hand, how cross'd,</div>
                     <div class="line">the instruments,</div>
                     <div class="line">Who wrought with them, and all things else that might</div>
                     <div class="line">To half a soul and to a notion crazed</div>
                     <div class="line">Say 'Thus did Banquo.'</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                     <div class="line">You made it known to us.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">I did so, and went further, which is now</div>
                     <div class="line">Our point of second meeting. Do you find</div>
                     <div class="line">Your patience so predominant in your nature</div>
                     <div class="line">That you can let this go? Are you so gospell'd</div>
                     <div class="line">To pray for this good man and for his issue,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose heavy hand hath bow'd you to the grave</div>
                     <div class="line">And beggar'd yours for ever?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                     <div class="line">We are men, my liege.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, in the catalogue ye go for men;</div>
                     <div class="line">As hounds and greyhounds, mongrels, spaniels, curs,</div>
                     <div class="line">Shoughs, water-rugs and demi-wolves, are clept</div>
                     <div class="line">All by the name of dogs: the valued file</div>
                     <div class="line">Distinguishes the swift, the slow, the subtle,</div>
                     <div class="line">The housekeeper, the hunter, every one</div>
                     <div class="line">According to the gift which bounteous nature</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath in him closed; whereby he does receive</div>
                     <div class="line">Particular addition. from the bill</div>
                     <div class="line">That writes them all alike: and so of men.</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, if you have a station in the file,</div>
                     <div class="line">Not i' the worst rank of manhood, say 't;</div>
                     <div class="line">And I will put that business in your bosoms,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose execution takes your enemy off,</div>
                     <div class="line">Grapples you to the heart and love of us,</div>
                     <div class="line">Who wear our health but sickly in his life,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which in his death were perfect.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Second Murderer</div>
                     <div class="line">I am one, my liege,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whom the vile blows and buffets of the world</div>
                     <div class="line">Have so incensed that I am reckless what</div>
                     <div class="line">I do to spite the world.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                     <div class="line">And I another</div>
                     <div class="line">So weary with disasters, tugg'd with fortune,</div>
                     <div class="line">That I would set my lie on any chance,</div>
                     <div class="line">To mend it, or be rid on't.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Both of you</div>
                     <div class="line">Know Banquo was your enemy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Both Murderers</div>
                     <div class="line">True, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">So is he mine; and in such bloody distance,</div>
                     <div class="line">That every minute of his being thrusts</div>
                     <div class="line">Against my near'st of life: and though I could</div>
                     <div class="line">With barefaced power sweep him from my sight</div>
                     <div class="line">And bid my will avouch it, yet I must not,</div>
                     <div class="line">For certain friends that are both his and mine,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose loves I may not drop, but wail his fall</div>
                     <div class="line">Who I myself struck down; and thence it is,</div>
                     <div class="line">That I to your assistance do make love,</div>
                     <div class="line">Masking the business from the common eye</div>
                     <div class="line">For sundry weighty reasons.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Second Murderer</div>
                     <div class="line">We shall, my lord,</div>
                     <div class="line">Perform what you command us.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                     <div class="line">Though our lives--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Your spirits shine through you. Within this hour at most</div>
                     <div class="line">I will advise you where to plant yourselves;</div>
                     <div class="line">Acquaint you with the perfect spy o' the time,</div>
                     <div class="line">The moment on't; for't must be done to-night,</div>
                     <div class="line">And something from the palace; always thought</div>
                     <div class="line">That I require a clearness: and with him--</div>
                     <div class="line">To leave no rubs nor botches in the work--</div>
                     <div class="line">Fleance his son, that keeps him company,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose absence is no less material to me</div>
                     <div class="line">Than is his father's, must embrace the fate</div>
                     <div class="line">Of that dark hour. Resolve yourselves apart:</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll come to you anon.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Both Murderers</div>
                     <div class="line">We are resolved, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll call upon you straight: abide within.</div>
                     <p>Exeunt Murderers</p>
                     <div class="line">It is concluded. Banquo, thy soul's flight,</div>
                     <div class="line">If it find heaven, must find it out to-night.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.5.3">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>2. SCENE II.  The palace.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter LADY MACBETH and a Servant</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Is Banquo gone from court?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, madam, but returns again to-night.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Say to the king, I would attend his leisure</div>
                     <div class="line">For a few words.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                     <div class="line">Madam, I will.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Nought's had, all's spent,</div>
                     <div class="line">Where our desire is got without content:</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis safer to be that which we destroy</div>
                     <div class="line">Than by destruction dwell in doubtful joy.</div>
                     <p>Enter MACBETH</p>
                     <div class="line">How now, my lord! why do you keep alone,</div>
                     <div class="line">Of sorriest fancies your companions making,</div>
                     <div class="line">Using those thoughts which should indeed have died</div>
                     <div class="line">With them they think on? Things without all remedy</div>
                     <div class="line">Should be without regard: what's done is done.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">We have scotch'd the snake, not kill'd it:</div>
                     <div class="line">She'll close and be herself, whilst our poor malice</div>
                     <div class="line">Remains in danger of her former tooth.</div>
                     <div class="line">But let the frame of things disjoint, both the</div>
                     <div class="line">worlds suffer,</div>
                     <div class="line">Ere we will eat our meal in fear and sleep</div>
                     <div class="line">In the affliction of these terrible dreams</div>
                     <div class="line">That shake us nightly: better be with the dead,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whom we, to gain our peace, have sent to peace,</div>
                     <div class="line">Than on the torture of the mind to lie</div>
                     <div class="line">In restless ecstasy. Duncan is in his grave;</div>
                     <div class="line">After life's fitful fever he sleeps well;</div>
                     <div class="line">Treason has done his worst: nor steel, nor poison,</div>
                     <div class="line">Malice domestic, foreign levy, nothing,</div>
                     <div class="line">Can touch him further.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Come on;</div>
                     <div class="line">Gentle my lord, sleek o'er your rugged looks;</div>
                     <div class="line">Be bright and jovial among your guests to-night.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">So shall I, love; and so, I pray, be you:</div>
                     <div class="line">Let your remembrance apply to Banquo;</div>
                     <div class="line">Present him eminence, both with eye and tongue:</div>
                     <div class="line">Unsafe the while, that we</div>
                     <div class="line">Must lave our honours in these flattering streams,</div>
                     <div class="line">And make our faces vizards to our hearts,</div>
                     <div class="line">Disguising what they are.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">You must leave this.</div>
                  </div>
