               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Son</div>
                     <div class="line">Then the liars and swearers are fools,</div>
                     <div class="line">for there are liars and swearers enow to beat</div>
                     <div class="line">the honest men and hang up them.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, God help thee, poor monkey!</div>
                     <div class="line">But how wilt thou do for a father?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Son</div>
                     <div class="line">If he were dead, you'ld weep for</div>
                     <div class="line">him: if you would not, it were a good sign</div>
                     <div class="line">that I should quickly have a new father.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Poor prattler, how thou talk'st!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter a Messenger</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                     <div class="line">Bless you, fair dame! I am not to you known,</div>
                     <div class="line">Though in your state of honour I am perfect.</div>
                     <div class="line">I doubt some danger does approach you nearly:</div>
                     <div class="line">If you will take a homely man's advice,</div>
                     <div class="line">Be not found here; hence, with your little ones.</div>
                     <div class="line">To fright you thus, methinks, I am too savage;</div>
                     <div class="line">To do worse to you were fell cruelty,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which is too nigh your person. Heaven preserve you!</div>
                     <div class="line">I dare abide no longer.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Whither should I fly?</div>
                     <div class="line">I have done no harm. But I remember now</div>
                     <div class="line">I am in this earthly world; where to do harm</div>
                     <div class="line">Is often laudable, to do good sometime</div>
                     <div class="line">Accounted dangerous folly: why then, alas,</div>
                     <div class="line">Do I put up that womanly defence,</div>
                     <div class="line">To say I have done no harm?</div>
                     <p>Enter Murderers</p>
                     <div class="line">What are these faces?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                     <div class="line">Where is your husband?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">I hope, in no place so unsanctified</div>
                     <div class="line">Where such as thou mayst find him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                     <div class="line">He's a traitor.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Son</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou liest, thou shag-hair'd villain!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                     <div class="line">What, you egg!</div>
                     <p>Stabbing him</p>
                     <div class="line">Young fry of treachery!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Son</div>
                     <div class="line">He has kill'd me, mother:</div>
                     <div class="line">Run away, I pray you!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Dies</p>
               <p>Exit LADY MACDUFF, crying 'Murder!' Exeunt
Murderers, following her</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.6.4">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>3. SCENE III.  England. Before the King's palace.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter MALCOLM and MACDUFF</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">Let us seek out some desolate shade, and there</div>
                     <div class="line">Weep our sad bosoms empty.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Let us rather</div>
                     <div class="line">Hold fast the mortal sword, and like good men</div>
                     <div class="line">Bestride our down-fall'n birthdom: each new morn</div>
                     <div class="line">New widows howl, new orphans cry, new sorrows</div>
                     <div class="line">Strike heaven on the face, that it resounds</div>
                     <div class="line">As if it felt with Scotland and yell'd out</div>
                     <div class="line">Like syllable of dolour.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">What I believe I'll wail,</div>
                     <div class="line">What know believe, and what I can redress,</div>
                     <div class="line">As I shall find the time to friend, I will.</div>
                     <div class="line">What you have spoke, it may be so perchance.</div>
                     <div class="line">This tyrant, whose sole name blisters our tongues,</div>
                     <div class="line">Was once thought honest: you have loved him well.</div>
                     <div class="line">He hath not touch'd you yet. I am young;</div>
                     <div class="line">but something</div>
                     <div class="line">You may deserve of him through me, and wisdom</div>
                     <div class="line">To offer up a weak poor innocent lamb</div>
                     <div class="line">To appease an angry god.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">I am not treacherous.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">But Macbeth is.</div>
                     <div class="line">A good and virtuous nature may recoil</div>
                     <div class="line">In an imperial charge. But I shall crave</div>
                     <div class="line">your pardon;</div>
                     <div class="line">That which you are my thoughts cannot transpose:</div>
                     <div class="line">Angels are bright still, though the brightest fell;</div>
                     <div class="line">Though all things foul would wear the brows of grace,</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet grace must still look so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">I have lost my hopes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">Perchance even there where I did find my doubts.</div>
                     <div class="line">Why in that rawness left you wife and child,</div>
                     <div class="line">Those precious motives, those strong knots of love,</div>
                     <div class="line">Without leave-taking? I pray you,</div>
                     <div class="line">Let not my jealousies be your dishonours,</div>
                     <div class="line">But mine own safeties. You may be rightly just,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whatever I shall think.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Bleed, bleed, poor country!</div>
                     <div class="line">Great tyranny! lay thou thy basis sure,</div>
                     <div class="line">For goodness dare not cheque thee: wear thou</div>
                     <div class="line">thy wrongs;</div>
                     <div class="line">The title is affeer'd! Fare thee well, lord:</div>
                     <div class="line">I would not be the villain that thou think'st</div>
                     <div class="line">For the whole space that's in the tyrant's grasp,</div>
                     <div class="line">And the rich East to boot.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">Be not offended:</div>
                     <div class="line">I speak not as in absolute fear of you.</div>
                     <div class="line">I think our country sinks beneath the yoke;</div>
                     <div class="line">It weeps, it bleeds; and each new day a gash</div>
                     <div class="line">Is added to her wounds: I think withal</div>
                     <div class="line">There would be hands uplifted in my right;</div>
                     <div class="line">And here from gracious England have I offer</div>
                     <div class="line">Of goodly thousands: but, for all this,</div>
                     <div class="line">When I shall tread upon the tyrant's head,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or wear it on my sword, yet my poor country</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall have more vices than it had before,</div>
                     <div class="line">More suffer and more sundry ways than ever,</div>
                     <div class="line">By him that shall succeed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">What should he be?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">It is myself I mean: in whom I know</div>
                     <div class="line">All the particulars of vice so grafted</div>
                     <div class="line">That, when they shall be open'd, black Macbeth</div>
                     <div class="line">Will seem as pure as snow, and the poor state</div>
                     <div class="line">Esteem him as a lamb, being compared</div>
                     <div class="line">With my confineless harms.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Not in the legions</div>
                     <div class="line">Of horrid hell can come a devil more damn'd</div>
                     <div class="line">In evils to top Macbeth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">I grant him bloody,</div>
                     <div class="line">Luxurious, avaricious, false, deceitful,</div>
                     <div class="line">Sudden, malicious, smacking of every sin</div>
                     <div class="line">That has a name: but there's no bottom, none,</div>
                     <div class="line">In my voluptuousness: your wives, your daughters,</div>
                     <div class="line">Your matrons and your maids, could not fill up</div>
                     <div class="line">The cistern of my lust, and my desire</div>
                     <div class="line">All continent impediments would o'erbear</div>
                     <div class="line">That did oppose my will: better Macbeth</div>
                     <div class="line">Than such an one to reign.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Boundless intemperance</div>
                     <div class="line">In nature is a tyranny; it hath been</div>
                     <div class="line">The untimely emptying of the happy throne</div>
                     <div class="line">And fall of many kings. But fear not yet</div>
                     <div class="line">To take upon you what is yours: you may</div>
                     <div class="line">Convey your pleasures in a spacious plenty,</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet seem cold, the time you may so hoodwink.</div>
                     <div class="line">We have willing dames enough: there cannot be</div>
                     <div class="line">That vulture in you, to devour so many</div>
                     <div class="line">As will to greatness dedicate themselves,</div>
                     <div class="line">Finding it so inclined.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">With this there grows</div>
                     <div class="line">In my most ill-composed affection such</div>
                     <div class="line">A stanchless avarice that, were I king,</div>
                     <div class="line">I should cut off the nobles for their lands,</div>
                     <div class="line">Desire his jewels and this other's house:</div>
                     <div class="line">And my more-having would be as a sauce</div>
                     <div class="line">To make me hunger more; that I should forge</div>
                     <div class="line">Quarrels unjust against the good and loyal,</div>
                     <div class="line">Destroying them for wealth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">This avarice</div>
                     <div class="line">Sticks deeper, grows with more pernicious root</div>
                     <div class="line">Than summer-seeming lust, and it hath been</div>
                     <div class="line">The sword of our slain kings: yet do not fear;</div>
                     <div class="line">Scotland hath foisons to fill up your will.</div>
                     <div class="line">Of your mere own: all these are portable,</div>
                     <div class="line">With other graces weigh'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">But I have none: the king-becoming graces,</div>
                     <div class="line">As justice, verity, temperance, stableness,</div>
                     <div class="line">Bounty, perseverance, mercy, lowliness,</div>
                     <div class="line">Devotion, patience, courage, fortitude,</div>
                     <div class="line">I have no relish of them, but abound</div>
                     <div class="line">In the division of each several crime,</div>
                     <div class="line">Acting it many ways. Nay, had I power, I should</div>
                     <div class="line">Pour the sweet milk of concord into hell,</div>
                     <div class="line">Uproar the universal peace, confound</div>
                     <div class="line">All unity on earth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">O Scotland, Scotland!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">If such a one be fit to govern, speak:</div>
                     <div class="line">I am as I have spoken.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Fit to govern!</div>
                     <div class="line">No, not to live. O nation miserable,</div>
                     <div class="line">With an untitled tyrant bloody-scepter'd,</div>
                     <div class="line">When shalt thou see thy wholesome days again,</div>
                     <div class="line">Since that the truest issue of thy throne</div>
                     <div class="line">By his own interdiction stands accursed,</div>
                     <div class="line">And does blaspheme his breed? Thy royal father</div>
                     <div class="line">Was a most sainted king: the queen that bore thee,</div>
                     <div class="line">Oftener upon her knees than on her feet,</div>
                     <div class="line">Died every day she lived. Fare thee well!</div>
                     <div class="line">These evils thou repeat'st upon thyself</div>
                     <div class="line">Have banish'd me from Scotland. O my breast,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy hope ends here!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">Macduff, this noble passion,</div>
                     <div class="line">Child of integrity, hath from my soul</div>
                     <div class="line">Wiped the black scruples, reconciled my thoughts</div>
                     <div class="line">To thy good truth and honour. Devilish Macbeth</div>
                     <div class="line">By many of these trains hath sought to win me</div>
                     <div class="line">Into his power, and modest wisdom plucks me</div>
                     <div class="line">From over-credulous haste: but God above</div>
                     <div class="line">Deal between thee and me! for even now</div>
                     <div class="line">I put myself to thy direction, and</div>
                     <div class="line">Unspeak mine own detraction, here abjure</div>
                     <div class="line">The taints and blames I laid upon myself,</div>
                     <div class="line">For strangers to my nature. I am yet</div>
                     <div class="line">Unknown to woman, never was forsworn,</div>
                     <div class="line">Scarcely have coveted what was mine own,</div>
                     <div class="line">At no time broke my faith, would not betray</div>
                     <div class="line">The devil to his fellow and delight</div>
                     <div class="line">No less in truth than life: my first false speaking</div>
                     <div class="line">Was this upon myself: what I am truly,</div>
                     <div class="line">Is thine and my poor country's to command:</div>
                     <div class="line">Whither indeed, before thy here-approach,</div>
                     <div class="line">Old Siward, with ten thousand warlike men,</div>
                     <div class="line">Already at a point, was setting forth.</div>
                     <div class="line">Now we'll together; and the chance of goodness</div>
                     <div class="line">Be like our warranted quarrel! Why are you silent?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Such welcome and unwelcome things at once</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis hard to reconcile.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter a Doctor</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">Well; more anon.--Comes the king forth, I pray you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, sir; there are a crew of wretched souls</div>
                     <div class="line">That stay his cure: their malady convinces</div>
                     <div class="line">The great assay of art; but at his touch--</div>
                     <div class="line">Such sanctity hath heaven given his hand--</div>
                     <div class="line">They presently amend.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">I thank you, doctor.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit Doctor</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">What's the disease he means?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis call'd the evil:</div>
                     <div class="line">A most miraculous work in this good king;</div>
                     <div class="line">Which often, since my here-remain in England,</div>
                     <div class="line">I have seen him do. How he solicits heaven,</div>
                     <div class="line">Himself best knows: but strangely-visited people,</div>
                     <div class="line">All swoln and ulcerous, pitiful to the eye,</div>
                     <div class="line">The mere despair of surgery, he cures,</div>
                     <div class="line">Hanging a golden stamp about their necks,</div>
                     <div class="line">Put on with holy prayers: and 'tis spoken,</div>
                     <div class="line">To the succeeding royalty he leaves</div>
                     <div class="line">The healing benediction. With this strange virtue,</div>
                     <div class="line">He hath a heavenly gift of prophecy,</div>
                     <div class="line">And sundry blessings hang about his throne,</div>
                     <div class="line">That speak him full of grace.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter ROSS</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">See, who comes here?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">My countryman; but yet I know him not.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">My ever-gentle cousin, welcome hither.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">I know him now. Good God, betimes remove</div>
                     <div class="line">The means that makes us strangers!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, amen.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Stands Scotland where it did?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas, poor country!</div>
                     <div class="line">Almost afraid to know itself. It cannot</div>
                     <div class="line">Be call'd our mother, but our grave; where nothing,</div>
                     <div class="line">But who knows nothing, is once seen to smile;</div>
                     <div class="line">Where sighs and groans and shrieks that rend the air</div>
                     <div class="line">Are made, not mark'd; where violent sorrow seems</div>
                     <div class="line">A modern ecstasy; the dead man's knell</div>
                     <div class="line">Is there scarce ask'd for who; and good men's lives</div>
                     <div class="line">Expire before the flowers in their caps,</div>
                     <div class="line">Dying or ere they sicken.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">O, relation</div>
                     <div class="line">Too nice, and yet too true!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">What's the newest grief?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                     <div class="line">That of an hour's age doth hiss the speaker:</div>
                     <div class="line">Each minute teems a new one.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">How does my wife?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, well.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">And all my children?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                     <div class="line">Well too.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">The tyrant has not batter'd at their peace?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                     <div class="line">No; they were well at peace when I did leave 'em.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">But not a niggard of your speech: how goes't?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                     <div class="line">When I came hither to transport the tidings,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which I have heavily borne, there ran a rumour</div>
                     <div class="line">Of many worthy fellows that were out;</div>
                     <div class="line">Which was to my belief witness'd the rather,</div>
                     <div class="line">For that I saw the tyrant's power a-foot:</div>
                     <div class="line">Now is the time of help; your eye in Scotland</div>
                     <div class="line">Would create soldiers, make our women fight,</div>
                     <div class="line">To doff their dire distresses.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">Be't their comfort</div>
                     <div class="line">We are coming thither: gracious England hath</div>
                     <div class="line">Lent us good Siward and ten thousand men;</div>
                     <div class="line">An older and a better soldier none</div>
                     <div class="line">That Christendom gives out.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                     <div class="line">Would I could answer</div>
                     <div class="line">This comfort with the like! But I have words</div>
                     <div class="line">That would be howl'd out in the desert air,</div>
                     <div class="line">Where hearing should not latch them.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">What concern they?</div>
                     <div class="line">The general cause? or is it a fee-grief</div>
                     <div class="line">Due to some single breast?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                     <div class="line">No mind that's honest</div>
                     <div class="line">But in it shares some woe; though the main part</div>
                     <div class="line">Pertains to you alone.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">If it be mine,</div>
                     <div class="line">Keep it not from me, quickly let me have it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                     <div class="line">Let not your ears despise my tongue for ever,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which shall possess them with the heaviest sound</div>
                     <div class="line">That ever yet they heard.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Hum! I guess at it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                     <div class="line">Your castle is surprised; your wife and babes</div>
                     <div class="line">Savagely slaughter'd: to relate the manner,</div>
                     <div class="line">Were, on the quarry of these murder'd deer,</div>
                     <div class="line">To add the death of you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">Merciful heaven!</div>
                     <div class="line">What, man! ne'er pull your hat upon your brows;</div>
                     <div class="line">Give sorrow words: the grief that does not speak</div>
                     <div class="line">Whispers the o'er-fraught heart and bids it break.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">My children too?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                     <div class="line">Wife, children, servants, all</div>
                     <div class="line">That could be found.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">And I must be from thence!</div>
                     <div class="line">My wife kill'd too?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                     <div class="line">I have said.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">Be comforted:</div>
                     <div class="line">Let's make us medicines of our great revenge,</div>
                     <div class="line">To cure this deadly grief.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">He has no children. All my pretty ones?</div>
                     <div class="line">Did you say all? O hell-kite! All?</div>
                     <div class="line">What, all my pretty chickens and their dam</div>
                     <div class="line">At one fell swoop?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">Dispute it like a man.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">I shall do so;</div>
                     <div class="line">But I must also feel it as a man:</div>
                     <div class="line">I cannot but remember such things were,</div>
                     <div class="line">That were most precious to me. Did heaven look on,</div>
                     <div class="line">And would not take their part? Sinful Macduff,</div>
                     <div class="line">They were all struck for thee! naught that I am,</div>
                     <div class="line">Not for their own demerits, but for mine,</div>
                     <div class="line">Fell slaughter on their souls. Heaven rest them now!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">Be this the whetstone of your sword: let grief</div>
                     <div class="line">Convert to anger; blunt not the heart, enrage it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">O, I could play the woman with mine eyes</div>
                     <div class="line">And braggart with my tongue! But, gentle heavens,</div>
                     <div class="line">Cut short all intermission; front to front</div>
                     <div class="line">Bring thou this fiend of Scotland and myself;</div>
                     <div class="line">Within my sword's length set him; if he 'scape,</div>
                     <div class="line">Heaven forgive him too!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">This tune goes manly.</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, go we to the king; our power is ready;</div>
                     <div class="line">Our lack is nothing but our leave; Macbeth</div>
                     <div class="line">Is ripe for shaking, and the powers above</div>
                     <div class="line">Put on their instruments. Receive what cheer you may:</div>
                     <div class="line">The night is long that never finds the day.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
         </article>
         <article class="chapter" id="R.1.7">
            <header class="chapter-titlepage">
               <h2>Chapter 5. ACT V</h2>
            </header>
            <div class="lists-of-titles">
               <div class="toc">
                  <p>
                     <b>Table of Contents</b>
                  </p>
                  <ul class="toc">
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.7.2">1. SCENE I.  Dunsinane. Ante-room in the castle.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.7.3">2. SCENE II.  The country near Dunsinane.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.7.4">3. SCENE III.  Dunsinane. A room in the castle.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.7.5">4. SCENE IV.  Country near Birnam wood.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.7.6">5. SCENE V.  Dunsinane. Within the castle.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.7.7">6. SCENE VI.  Dunsinane. Before the castle.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.7.8">7. SCENE VII.  Another part of the field.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.7.9">8. SCENE VIII.  Another part of the field.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                  </ul>
               </div>
            </div>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.2">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>1. SCENE I.  Dunsinane. Ante-room in the castle.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter a Doctor of Physic and a Waiting-Gentlewoman</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">I have two nights watched with you, but can perceive</div>
                     <div class="line">no truth in your report. When was it she last walked?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentlewoman</div>
                     <div class="line">Since his majesty went into the field, I have seen</div>
                     <div class="line">her rise from her bed, throw her night-gown upon</div>
                     <div class="line">her, unlock her closet, take forth paper, fold it,</div>
                     <div class="line">write upon't, read it, afterwards seal it, and again</div>
                     <div class="line">return to bed; yet all this while in a most fast sleep.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">A great perturbation in nature, to receive at once</div>
                     <div class="line">the benefit of sleep, and do the effects of</div>
                     <div class="line">watching! In this slumbery agitation, besides her</div>
                     <div class="line">walking and other actual performances, what, at any</div>
                     <div class="line">time, have you heard her say?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentlewoman</div>
                     <div class="line">That, sir, which I will not report after her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">You may to me: and 'tis most meet you should.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentlewoman</div>
                     <div class="line">Neither to you nor any one; having no witness to</div>
                     <div class="line">confirm my speech.</div>
                     <p>Enter LADY MACBETH, with a taper</p>
                     <div class="line">Lo you, here she comes! This is her very guise;</div>
                     <div class="line">and, upon my life, fast asleep. Observe her; stand close.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">How came she by that light?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentlewoman</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, it stood by her: she has light by her</div>
                     <div class="line">continually; 'tis her command.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">You see, her eyes are open.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentlewoman</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, but their sense is shut.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">What is it she does now? Look, how she rubs her hands.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentlewoman</div>
                     <div class="line">It is an accustomed action with her, to seem thus</div>
                     <div class="line">washing her hands: I have known her continue in</div>
                     <div class="line">this a quarter of an hour.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet here's a spot.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">Hark! she speaks: I will set down what comes from</div>
                     <div class="line">her, to satisfy my remembrance the more strongly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Out, damned spot! out, I say!--One: two: why,</div>
                     <div class="line">then, 'tis time to do't.--Hell is murky!--Fie, my</div>
                     <div class="line">lord, fie! a soldier, and afeard? What need we</div>
                     <div class="line">fear who knows it, when none can call our power to</div>
                     <div class="line">account?--Yet who would have thought the old man</div>
                     <div class="line">to have had so much blood in him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">Do you mark that?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">The thane of Fife had a wife: where is she now?--</div>
                     <div class="line">What, will these hands ne'er be clean?--No more o'</div>
                     <div class="line">that, my lord, no more o' that: you mar all with</div>
                     <div class="line">this starting.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">Go to, go to; you have known what you should not.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentlewoman</div>
                     <div class="line">She has spoke what she should not, I am sure of</div>
                     <div class="line">that: heaven knows what she has known.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Here's the smell of the blood still: all the</div>
                     <div class="line">perfumes of Arabia will not sweeten this little</div>
                     <div class="line">hand. Oh, oh, oh!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">What a sigh is there! The heart is sorely charged.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentlewoman</div>
                     <div class="line">I would not have such a heart in my bosom for the</div>
                     <div class="line">dignity of the whole body.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, well, well,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentlewoman</div>
                     <div class="line">Pray God it be, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">This disease is beyond my practise: yet I have known</div>
                     <div class="line">those which have walked in their sleep who have died</div>
                     <div class="line">holily in their beds.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Wash your hands, put on your nightgown; look not so</div>
                     <div class="line">pale.--I tell you yet again, Banquo's buried; he</div>
                     <div class="line">cannot come out on's grave.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">Even so?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">To bed, to bed! there's knocking at the gate:</div>
                     <div class="line">come, come, come, come, give me your hand. What's</div>
                     <div class="line">done cannot be undone.--To bed, to bed, to bed!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">Will she go now to bed?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentlewoman</div>
                     <div class="line">Directly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">Foul whisperings are abroad: unnatural deeds</div>
                     <div class="line">Do breed unnatural troubles: infected minds</div>
                     <div class="line">To their deaf pillows will discharge their secrets:</div>
                     <div class="line">More needs she the divine than the physician.</div>
                     <div class="line">God, God forgive us all! Look after her;</div>
                     <div class="line">Remove from her the means of all annoyance,</div>
                     <div class="line">And still keep eyes upon her. So, good night:</div>
                     <div class="line">My mind she has mated, and amazed my sight.</div>
                     <div class="line">I think, but dare not speak.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentlewoman</div>
                     <div class="line">Good night, good doctor.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.3">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>2. SCENE II.  The country near Dunsinane.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Drum and colours. Enter MENTEITH, CAITHNESS, ANGUS,
LENNOX, and Soldiers</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MENTEITH</div>
                     <div class="line">The English power is near, led on by Malcolm,</div>
                     <div class="line">His uncle Siward and the good Macduff:</div>
                     <div class="line">Revenges burn in them; for their dear causes</div>
                     <div class="line">Would to the bleeding and the grim alarm</div>
                     <div class="line">Excite the mortified man.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Near Birnam wood</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall we well meet them; that way are they coming.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CAITHNESS</div>
                     <div class="line">Who knows if Donalbain be with his brother?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                     <div class="line">For certain, sir, he is not: I have a file</div>
                     <div class="line">Of all the gentry: there is Siward's son,</div>
                     <div class="line">And many unrough youths that even now</div>
                     <div class="line">Protest their first of manhood.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MENTEITH</div>
                     <div class="line">What does the tyrant?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CAITHNESS</div>
                     <div class="line">Great Dunsinane he strongly fortifies:</div>
                     <div class="line">Some say he's mad; others that lesser hate him</div>
                     <div class="line">Do call it valiant fury: but, for certain,</div>
                     <div class="line">He cannot buckle his distemper'd cause</div>
                     <div class="line">Within the belt of rule.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Now does he feel</div>
                     <div class="line">His secret murders sticking on his hands;</div>
                     <div class="line">Now minutely revolts upbraid his faith-breach;</div>
                     <div class="line">Those he commands move only in command,</div>
                     <div class="line">Nothing in love: now does he feel his title</div>
                     <div class="line">Hang loose about him, like a giant's robe</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon a dwarfish thief.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MENTEITH</div>
                     <div class="line">Who then shall blame</div>
                     <div class="line">His pester'd senses to recoil and start,</div>
                     <div class="line">When all that is within him does condemn</div>
                     <div class="line">Itself for being there?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CAITHNESS</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, march we on,</div>
                     <div class="line">To give obedience where 'tis truly owed:</div>
                     <div class="line">Meet we the medicine of the sickly weal,</div>
                     <div class="line">And with him pour we in our country's purge</div>
                     <div class="line">Each drop of us.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                     <div class="line">Or so much as it needs,</div>
                     <div class="line">To dew the sovereign flower and drown the weeds.</div>
                     <div class="line">Make we our march towards Birnam.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt, marching</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.4">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>3. SCENE III.  Dunsinane. A room in the castle.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter MACBETH, Doctor, and Attendants</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Bring me no more reports; let them fly all:</div>
                     <div class="line">Till Birnam wood remove to Dunsinane,</div>
                     <div class="line">I cannot taint with fear. What's the boy Malcolm?</div>
                     <div class="line">Was he not born of woman? The spirits that know</div>
                     <div class="line">All mortal consequences have pronounced me thus:</div>
                     <div class="line">'Fear not, Macbeth; no man that's born of woman</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall e'er have power upon thee.' Then fly,</div>
                     <div class="line">false thanes,</div>
                     <div class="line">And mingle with the English epicures:</div>
                     <div class="line">The mind I sway by and the heart I bear</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall never sag with doubt nor shake with fear.</div>
                     <p>Enter a Servant</p>
                     <div class="line">The devil damn thee black, thou cream-faced loon!</div>
                     <div class="line">Where got'st thou that goose look?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                     <div class="line">There is ten thousand--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Geese, villain!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                     <div class="line">Soldiers, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Go prick thy face, and over-red thy fear,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou lily-liver'd boy. What soldiers, patch?</div>
                     <div class="line">Death of thy soul! those linen cheeks of thine</div>
                     <div class="line">Are counsellors to fear. What soldiers, whey-face?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                     <div class="line">The English force, so please you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Take thy face hence.</div>
                     <p>Exit Servant</p>
                     <div class="line">Seyton!--I am sick at heart,</div>
                     <div class="line">When I behold--Seyton, I say!--This push</div>
                     <div class="line">Will cheer me ever, or disseat me now.</div>
                     <div class="line">I have lived long enough: my way of life</div>
                     <div class="line">Is fall'n into the sear, the yellow leaf;</div>
                     <div class="line">And that which should accompany old age,</div>
                     <div class="line">As honour, love, obedience, troops of friends,</div>
                     <div class="line">I must not look to have; but, in their stead,</div>
                     <div class="line">Curses, not loud but deep, mouth-honour, breath,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which the poor heart would fain deny, and dare not. Seyton!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter SEYTON</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEYTON</div>
                     <div class="line">What is your gracious pleasure?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">What news more?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEYTON</div>
                     <div class="line">All is confirm'd, my lord, which was reported.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll fight till from my bones my flesh be hack'd.</div>
                     <div class="line">Give me my armour.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEYTON</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis not needed yet.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll put it on.</div>
                     <div class="line">Send out more horses; skirr the country round;</div>
                     <div class="line">Hang those that talk of fear. Give me mine armour.</div>
                     <div class="line">How does your patient, doctor?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">Not so sick, my lord,</div>
                     <div class="line">As she is troubled with thick coming fancies,</div>
                     <div class="line">That keep her from her rest.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Cure her of that.</div>
                     <div class="line">Canst thou not minister to a mind diseased,</div>
                     <div class="line">Pluck from the memory a rooted sorrow,</div>
                     <div class="line">Raze out the written troubles of the brain</div>
                     <div class="line">And with some sweet oblivious antidote</div>
                     <div class="line">Cleanse the stuff'd bosom of that perilous stuff</div>
                     <div class="line">Which weighs upon the heart?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">Therein the patient</div>
                     <div class="line">Must minister to himself.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Throw physic to the dogs; I'll none of it.</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, put mine armour on; give me my staff.</div>
                     <div class="line">Seyton, send out. Doctor, the thanes fly from me.</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, sir, dispatch. If thou couldst, doctor, cast</div>
                     <div class="line">The water of my land, find her disease,</div>
                     <div class="line">And purge it to a sound and pristine health,</div>
                     <div class="line">I would applaud thee to the very echo,</div>
                     <div class="line">That should applaud again.--Pull't off, I say.--</div>
                     <div class="line">What rhubarb, cyme, or what purgative drug,</div>
                     <div class="line">Would scour these English hence? Hear'st thou of them?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, my good lord; your royal preparation</div>
                     <div class="line">Makes us hear something.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Bring it after me.</div>
                     <div class="line">I will not be afraid of death and bane,</div>
                     <div class="line">Till Birnam forest come to Dunsinane.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>  Were I from Dunsinane away and clear,</div>
                     <div class="line">Profit again should hardly draw me here.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.5">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>4. SCENE IV.  Country near Birnam wood.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Drum and colours. Enter MALCOLM, SIWARD and YOUNG
SIWARD, MACDUFF, MENTEITH, CAITHNESS, ANGUS,
LENNOX, ROSS, and Soldiers, marching</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">Cousins, I hope the days are near at hand</div>
                     <div class="line">That chambers will be safe.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MENTEITH</div>
                     <div class="line">We doubt it nothing.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SIWARD</div>
                     <div class="line">What wood is this before us?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MENTEITH</div>
                     <div class="line">The wood of Birnam.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">Let every soldier hew him down a bough</div>
                     <div class="line">And bear't before him: thereby shall we shadow</div>
                     <div class="line">The numbers of our host and make discovery</div>
                     <div class="line">Err in report of us.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Soldiers</div>
                     <div class="line">It shall be done.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SIWARD</div>
                     <div class="line">We learn no other but the confident tyrant</div>
                     <div class="line">Keeps still in Dunsinane, and will endure</div>
                     <div class="line">Our setting down before 't.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis his main hope:</div>
                     <div class="line">For where there is advantage to be given,</div>
                     <div class="line">Both more and less have given him the revolt,</div>
                     <div class="line">And none serve with him but constrained things</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose hearts are absent too.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Let our just censures</div>
                     <div class="line">Attend the true event, and put we on</div>
                     <div class="line">Industrious soldiership.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SIWARD</div>
                     <div class="line">The time approaches</div>
                     <div class="line">That will with due decision make us know</div>
                     <div class="line">What we shall say we have and what we owe.</div>
                     <div class="line">Thoughts speculative their unsure hopes relate,</div>
                     <div class="line">But certain issue strokes must arbitrate:</div>
                     <div class="line">Towards which advance the war.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt, marching</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.6">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>5. SCENE V.  Dunsinane. Within the castle.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter MACBETH, SEYTON, and Soldiers, with drum
and colours</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Hang out our banners on the outward walls;</div>
                     <div class="line">The cry is still 'They come:' our castle's strength</div>
                     <div class="line">Will laugh a siege to scorn: here let them lie</div>
                     <div class="line">Till famine and the ague eat them up:</div>
                     <div class="line">Were they not forced with those that should be ours,</div>
                     <div class="line">We might have met them dareful, beard to beard,</div>
                     <div class="line">And beat them backward home.</div>
                     <p>A cry of women within</p>
                     <div class="line">What is that noise?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEYTON</div>
                     <div class="line">It is the cry of women, my good lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">I have almost forgot the taste of fears;</div>
                     <div class="line">The time has been, my senses would have cool'd</div>
                     <div class="line">To hear a night-shriek; and my fell of hair</div>
                     <div class="line">Would at a dismal treatise rouse and stir</div>
                     <div class="line">As life were in't: I have supp'd full with horrors;</div>
                     <div class="line">Direness, familiar to my slaughterous thoughts</div>
                     <div class="line">Cannot once start me.</div>
                     <p>Re-enter SEYTON</p>
                     <div class="line">Wherefore was that cry?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEYTON</div>
                     <div class="line">The queen, my lord, is dead.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">She should have died hereafter;</div>
                     <div class="line">There would have been a time for such a word.</div>
                     <div class="line">To-morrow, and to-morrow, and to-morrow,</div>
                     <div class="line">Creeps in this petty pace from day to day</div>
                     <div class="line">To the last syllable of recorded time,</div>
                     <div class="line">And all our yesterdays have lighted fools</div>
                     <div class="line">The way to dusty death. Out, out, brief candle!</div>
                     <div class="line">Life's but a walking shadow, a poor player</div>
                     <div class="line">That struts and frets his hour upon the stage</div>
                     <div class="line">And then is heard no more: it is a tale</div>
                     <div class="line">Told by an idiot, full of sound and fury,</div>
                     <div class="line">Signifying nothing.</div>
                     <p>Enter a Messenger</p>
                     <div class="line">Thou comest to use thy tongue; thy story quickly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                     <div class="line">Gracious my lord,</div>
                     <div class="line">I should report that which I say I saw,</div>
                     <div class="line">But know not how to do it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, say, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
