                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  The Prince of Cumberland! that is a step</div>
                              <div class="line">On which I must fall down, or else o'erleap,</div>
                              <div class="line">For in my way it lies. Stars, hide your fires;</div>
                              <div class="line">Let not light see my black and deep desires:</div>
                              <div class="line">The eye wink at the hand; yet let that be,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which the eye fears, when it is done, to see.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUNCAN</div>
                              <div class="line">True, worthy Banquo; he is full so valiant,</div>
                              <div class="line">And in his commendations I am fed;</div>
                              <div class="line">It is a banquet to me. Let's after him,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose care is gone before to bid us welcome:</div>
                              <div class="line">It is a peerless kinsman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Flourish. Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.6">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>5. SCENE V.  Inverness. Macbeth's castle.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter LADY MACBETH, reading a letter</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">'They met me in the day of success: and I have</div>
                              <div class="line">learned by the perfectest report, they have more in</div>
                              <div class="line">them than mortal knowledge. When I burned in desire</div>
                              <div class="line">to question them further, they made themselves air,</div>
                              <div class="line">into which they vanished. Whiles I stood rapt in</div>
                              <div class="line">the wonder of it, came missives from the king, who</div>
                              <div class="line">all-hailed me 'Thane of Cawdor;' by which title,</div>
                              <div class="line">before, these weird sisters saluted me, and referred</div>
                              <div class="line">me to the coming on of time, with 'Hail, king that</div>
                              <div class="line">shalt be!' This have I thought good to deliver</div>
                              <div class="line">thee, my dearest partner of greatness, that thou</div>
                              <div class="line">mightst not lose the dues of rejoicing, by being</div>
                              <div class="line">ignorant of what greatness is promised thee. Lay it</div>
                              <div class="line">to thy heart, and farewell.'</div>
                              <div class="line">Glamis thou art, and Cawdor; and shalt be</div>
                              <div class="line">What thou art promised: yet do I fear thy nature;</div>
                              <div class="line">It is too full o' the milk of human kindness</div>
                              <div class="line">To catch the nearest way: thou wouldst be great;</div>
                              <div class="line">Art not without ambition, but without</div>
                              <div class="line">The illness should attend it: what thou wouldst highly,</div>
                              <div class="line">That wouldst thou holily; wouldst not play false,</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet wouldst wrongly win: thou'ldst have, great Glamis,</div>
                              <div class="line">That which cries 'Thus thou must do, if thou have it;</div>
                              <div class="line">And that which rather thou dost fear to do</div>
                              <div class="line">Than wishest should be undone.' Hie thee hither,</div>
                              <div class="line">That I may pour my spirits in thine ear;</div>
                              <div class="line">And chastise with the valour of my tongue</div>
                              <div class="line">All that impedes thee from the golden round,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which fate and metaphysical aid doth seem</div>
                              <div class="line">To have thee crown'd withal.</div>
                              <p>Enter a Messenger</p>
                              <div class="line">What is your tidings?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">The king comes here to-night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou'rt mad to say it:</div>
                              <div class="line">Is not thy master with him? who, were't so,</div>
                              <div class="line">Would have inform'd for preparation.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">So please you, it is true: our thane is coming:</div>
                              <div class="line">One of my fellows had the speed of him,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, almost dead for breath, had scarcely more</div>
                              <div class="line">Than would make up his message.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Give him tending;</div>
                              <div class="line">He brings great news.</div>
                              <p>Exit Messenger</p>
                              <div class="line">The raven himself is hoarse</div>
                              <div class="line">That croaks the fatal entrance of Duncan</div>
                              <div class="line">Under my battlements. Come, you spirits</div>
                              <div class="line">That tend on mortal thoughts, unsex me here,</div>
                              <div class="line">And fill me from the crown to the toe top-full</div>
                              <div class="line">Of direst cruelty! make thick my blood;</div>
                              <div class="line">Stop up the access and passage to remorse,</div>
                              <div class="line">That no compunctious visitings of nature</div>
                              <div class="line">Shake my fell purpose, nor keep peace between</div>
                              <div class="line">The effect and it! Come to my woman's breasts,</div>
                              <div class="line">And take my milk for gall, you murdering ministers,</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherever in your sightless substances</div>
                              <div class="line">You wait on nature's mischief! Come, thick night,</div>
                              <div class="line">And pall thee in the dunnest smoke of hell,</div>
                              <div class="line">That my keen knife see not the wound it makes,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor heaven peep through the blanket of the dark,</div>
                              <div class="line">To cry 'Hold, hold!'</div>
                              <p>Enter MACBETH</p>
                              <div class="line">Great Glamis! worthy Cawdor!</div>
                              <div class="line">Greater than both, by the all-hail hereafter!</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy letters have transported me beyond</div>
                              <div class="line">This ignorant present, and I feel now</div>
                              <div class="line">The future in the instant.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">My dearest love,</div>
                              <div class="line">Duncan comes here to-night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">And when goes hence?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">To-morrow, as he purposes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">O, never</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall sun that morrow see!</div>
                              <div class="line">Your face, my thane, is as a book where men</div>
                              <div class="line">May read strange matters. To beguile the time,</div>
                              <div class="line">Look like the time; bear welcome in your eye,</div>
                              <div class="line">Your hand, your tongue: look like the innocent flower,</div>
                              <div class="line">But be the serpent under't. He that's coming</div>
                              <div class="line">Must be provided for: and you shall put</div>
                              <div class="line">This night's great business into my dispatch;</div>
                              <div class="line">Which shall to all our nights and days to come</div>
                              <div class="line">Give solely sovereign sway and masterdom.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">We will speak further.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Only look up clear;</div>
                              <div class="line">To alter favour ever is to fear:</div>
                              <div class="line">Leave all the rest to me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.7">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>6. SCENE VI.  Before Macbeth's castle.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Hautboys and torches. Enter DUNCAN, MALCOLM,
DONALBAIN, BANQUO, LENNOX, MACDUFF, ROSS, ANGUS,
and Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUNCAN</div>
                              <div class="line">This castle hath a pleasant seat; the air</div>
                              <div class="line">Nimbly and sweetly recommends itself</div>
                              <div class="line">Unto our gentle senses.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                              <div class="line">This guest of summer,</div>
                              <div class="line">The temple-haunting martlet, does approve,</div>
                              <div class="line">By his loved mansionry, that the heaven's breath</div>
                              <div class="line">Smells wooingly here: no jutty, frieze,</div>
                              <div class="line">Buttress, nor coign of vantage, but this bird</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath made his pendent bed and procreant cradle:</div>
                              <div class="line">Where they most breed and haunt, I have observed,</div>
                              <div class="line">The air is delicate.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter LADY MACBETH</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUNCAN</div>
                              <div class="line">See, see, our honour'd hostess!</div>
                              <div class="line">The love that follows us sometime is our trouble,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which still we thank as love. Herein I teach you</div>
                              <div class="line">How you shall bid God 'ild us for your pains,</div>
                              <div class="line">And thank us for your trouble.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">All our service</div>
                              <div class="line">In every point twice done and then done double</div>
                              <div class="line">Were poor and single business to contend</div>
                              <div class="line">Against those honours deep and broad wherewith</div>
                              <div class="line">Your majesty loads our house: for those of old,</div>
                              <div class="line">And the late dignities heap'd up to them,</div>
                              <div class="line">We rest your hermits.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUNCAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Where's the thane of Cawdor?</div>
                              <div class="line">We coursed him at the heels, and had a purpose</div>
                              <div class="line">To be his purveyor: but he rides well;</div>
                              <div class="line">And his great love, sharp as his spur, hath holp him</div>
                              <div class="line">To his home before us. Fair and noble hostess,</div>
                              <div class="line">We are your guest to-night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Your servants ever</div>
                              <div class="line">Have theirs, themselves and what is theirs, in compt,</div>
                              <div class="line">To make their audit at your highness' pleasure,</div>
                              <div class="line">Still to return your own.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUNCAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me your hand;</div>
                              <div class="line">Conduct me to mine host: we love him highly,</div>
                              <div class="line">And shall continue our graces towards him.</div>
                              <div class="line">By your leave, hostess.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.8">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>7. SCENE VII.  Macbeth's castle.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Hautboys and torches. Enter a Sewer, and divers
Servants with dishes and service, and pass over the
stage. Then enter MACBETH</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">If it were done when 'tis done, then 'twere well</div>
                              <div class="line">It were done quickly: if the assassination</div>
                              <div class="line">Could trammel up the consequence, and catch</div>
                              <div class="line">With his surcease success; that but this blow</div>
                              <div class="line">Might be the be-all and the end-all here,</div>
                              <div class="line">But here, upon this bank and shoal of time,</div>
                              <div class="line">We'ld jump the life to come. But in these cases</div>
                              <div class="line">We still have judgment here; that we but teach</div>
                              <div class="line">Bloody instructions, which, being taught, return</div>
                              <div class="line">To plague the inventor: this even-handed justice</div>
                              <div class="line">Commends the ingredients of our poison'd chalice</div>
                              <div class="line">To our own lips. He's here in double trust;</div>
                              <div class="line">First, as I am his kinsman and his subject,</div>
                              <div class="line">Strong both against the deed; then, as his host,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who should against his murderer shut the door,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not bear the knife myself. Besides, this Duncan</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath borne his faculties so meek, hath been</div>
                              <div class="line">So clear in his great office, that his virtues</div>
                              <div class="line">Will plead like angels, trumpet-tongued, against</div>
                              <div class="line">The deep damnation of his taking-off;</div>
                              <div class="line">And pity, like a naked new-born babe,</div>
                              <div class="line">Striding the blast, or heaven's cherubim, horsed</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon the sightless couriers of the air,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall blow the horrid deed in every eye,</div>
                              <div class="line">That tears shall drown the wind. I have no spur</div>
                              <div class="line">To prick the sides of my intent, but only</div>
                              <div class="line">Vaulting ambition, which o'erleaps itself</div>
                              <div class="line">And falls on the other.</div>
                              <p>Enter LADY MACBETH</p>
                              <div class="line">How now! what news?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">He has almost supp'd: why have you left the chamber?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath he ask'd for me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Know you not he has?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">We will proceed no further in this business:</div>
                              <div class="line">He hath honour'd me of late; and I have bought</div>
                              <div class="line">Golden opinions from all sorts of people,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which would be worn now in their newest gloss,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not cast aside so soon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Was the hope drunk</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherein you dress'd yourself? hath it slept since?</div>
                              <div class="line">And wakes it now, to look so green and pale</div>
                              <div class="line">At what it did so freely? From this time</div>
                              <div class="line">Such I account thy love. Art thou afeard</div>
                              <div class="line">To be the same in thine own act and valour</div>
                              <div class="line">As thou art in desire? Wouldst thou have that</div>
                              <div class="line">Which thou esteem'st the ornament of life,</div>
                              <div class="line">And live a coward in thine own esteem,</div>
                              <div class="line">Letting 'I dare not' wait upon 'I would,'</div>
                              <div class="line">Like the poor cat i' the adage?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, peace:</div>
                              <div class="line">I dare do all that may become a man;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who dares do more is none.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">What beast was't, then,</div>
                              <div class="line">That made you break this enterprise to me?</div>
                              <div class="line">When you durst do it, then you were a man;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, to be more than what you were, you would</div>
                              <div class="line">Be so much more the man. Nor time nor place</div>
                              <div class="line">Did then adhere, and yet you would make both:</div>
                              <div class="line">They have made themselves, and that their fitness now</div>
                              <div class="line">Does unmake you. I have given suck, and know</div>
                              <div class="line">How tender 'tis to love the babe that milks me:</div>
                              <div class="line">I would, while it was smiling in my face,</div>
                              <div class="line">Have pluck'd my nipple from his boneless gums,</div>
                              <div class="line">And dash'd the brains out, had I so sworn as you</div>
                              <div class="line">Have done to this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">If we should fail?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">We fail!</div>
                              <div class="line">But screw your courage to the sticking-place,</div>
                              <div class="line">And we'll not fail. When Duncan is asleep--</div>
                              <div class="line">Whereto the rather shall his day's hard journey</div>
                              <div class="line">Soundly invite him--his two chamberlains</div>
                              <div class="line">Will I with wine and wassail so convince</div>
                              <div class="line">That memory, the warder of the brain,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall be a fume, and the receipt of reason</div>
                              <div class="line">A limbeck only: when in swinish sleep</div>
                              <div class="line">Their drenched natures lie as in a death,</div>
                              <div class="line">What cannot you and I perform upon</div>
                              <div class="line">The unguarded Duncan? what not put upon</div>
                              <div class="line">His spongy officers, who shall bear the guilt</div>
                              <div class="line">Of our great quell?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Bring forth men-children only;</div>
                              <div class="line">For thy undaunted mettle should compose</div>
                              <div class="line">Nothing but males. Will it not be received,</div>
                              <div class="line">When we have mark'd with blood those sleepy two</div>
                              <div class="line">Of his own chamber and used their very daggers,</div>
                              <div class="line">That they have done't?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Who dares receive it other,</div>
                              <div class="line">As we shall make our griefs and clamour roar</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon his death?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">I am settled, and bend up</div>
                              <div class="line">Each corporal agent to this terrible feat.</div>
                              <div class="line">Away, and mock the time with fairest show:</div>
                              <div class="line">False face must hide what the false heart doth know.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.4">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 2. ACT II</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.2">1. SCENE I.  Court of Macbeth's castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.3">2. SCENE II.  The same.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.4">3. SCENE III.  The same.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.5">4. SCENE IV.  Outside Macbeth's castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  Court of Macbeth's castle.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter BANQUO, and FLEANCE bearing a torch before him</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                              <div class="line">How goes the night, boy?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLEANCE</div>
                              <div class="line">The moon is down; I have not heard the clock.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                              <div class="line">And she goes down at twelve.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLEANCE</div>
                              <div class="line">I take't, 'tis later, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                              <div class="line">Hold, take my sword. There's husbandry in heaven;</div>
                              <div class="line">Their candles are all out. Take thee that too.</div>
                              <div class="line">A heavy summons lies like lead upon me,</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet I would not sleep: merciful powers,</div>
                              <div class="line">Restrain in me the cursed thoughts that nature</div>
                              <div class="line">Gives way to in repose!</div>
                              <p>Enter MACBETH, and a Servant with a torch</p>
                              <div class="line">Give me my sword.</div>
                              <div class="line">Who's there?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">A friend.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                              <div class="line">What, sir, not yet at rest? The king's a-bed:</div>
                              <div class="line">He hath been in unusual pleasure, and</div>
                              <div class="line">Sent forth great largess to your offices.</div>
                              <div class="line">This diamond he greets your wife withal,</div>
                              <div class="line">By the name of most kind hostess; and shut up</div>
                              <div class="line">In measureless content.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Being unprepared,</div>
                              <div class="line">Our will became the servant to defect;</div>
                              <div class="line">Which else should free have wrought.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                              <div class="line">All's well.</div>
                              <div class="line">I dreamt last night of the three weird sisters:</div>
                              <div class="line">To you they have show'd some truth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">I think not of them:</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet, when we can entreat an hour to serve,</div>
                              <div class="line">We would spend it in some words upon that business,</div>
                              <div class="line">If you would grant the time.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                              <div class="line">At your kind'st leisure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">If you shall cleave to my consent, when 'tis,</div>
                              <div class="line">It shall make honour for you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                              <div class="line">So I lose none</div>
                              <div class="line">In seeking to augment it, but still keep</div>
                              <div class="line">My bosom franchised and allegiance clear,</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall be counsell'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Good repose the while!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thanks, sir: the like to you!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt BANQUO and FLEANCE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Go bid thy mistress, when my drink is ready,</div>
                              <div class="line">She strike upon the bell. Get thee to bed.</div>
                              <p>Exit Servant</p>
                              <div class="line">Is this a dagger which I see before me,</div>
                              <div class="line">The handle toward my hand? Come, let me clutch thee.</div>
                              <div class="line">I have thee not, and yet I see thee still.</div>
                              <div class="line">Art thou not, fatal vision, sensible</div>
                              <div class="line">To feeling as to sight? or art thou but</div>
                              <div class="line">A dagger of the mind, a false creation,</div>
                              <div class="line">Proceeding from the heat-oppressed brain?</div>
                              <div class="line">I see thee yet, in form as palpable</div>
                              <div class="line">As this which now I draw.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou marshall'st me the way that I was going;</div>
                              <div class="line">And such an instrument I was to use.</div>
                              <div class="line">Mine eyes are made the fools o' the other senses,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or else worth all the rest; I see thee still,</div>
                              <div class="line">And on thy blade and dudgeon gouts of blood,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which was not so before. There's no such thing:</div>
                              <div class="line">It is the bloody business which informs</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus to mine eyes. Now o'er the one halfworld</div>
                              <div class="line">Nature seems dead, and wicked dreams abuse</div>
                              <div class="line">The curtain'd sleep; witchcraft celebrates</div>
                              <div class="line">Pale Hecate's offerings, and wither'd murder,</div>
                              <div class="line">Alarum'd by his sentinel, the wolf,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose howl's his watch, thus with his stealthy pace.</div>
                              <div class="line">With Tarquin's ravishing strides, towards his design</div>
                              <div class="line">Moves like a ghost. Thou sure and firm-set earth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hear not my steps, which way they walk, for fear</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy very stones prate of my whereabout,</div>
                              <div class="line">And take the present horror from the time,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which now suits with it. Whiles I threat, he lives:</div>
                              <div class="line">Words to the heat of deeds too cold breath gives.</div>
                              <p>A bell rings</p>
                              <div class="line">I go, and it is done; the bell invites me.</div>
                              <div class="line">Hear it not, Duncan; for it is a knell</div>
                              <div class="line">That summons thee to heaven or to hell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  The same.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter LADY MACBETH</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">That which hath made them drunk hath made me bold;</div>
                              <div class="line">What hath quench'd them hath given me fire.</div>
                              <div class="line">Hark! Peace!</div>
                              <div class="line">It was the owl that shriek'd, the fatal bellman,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which gives the stern'st good-night. He is about it:</div>
                              <div class="line">The doors are open; and the surfeited grooms</div>
                              <div class="line">Do mock their charge with snores: I have drugg'd</div>
                              <div class="line">their possets,</div>
                              <div class="line">That death and nature do contend about them,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whether they live or die.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Who's there? what, ho!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Alack, I am afraid they have awaked,</div>
                              <div class="line">And 'tis not done. The attempt and not the deed</div>
                              <div class="line">Confounds us. Hark! I laid their daggers ready;</div>
                              <div class="line">He could not miss 'em. Had he not resembled</div>
                              <div class="line">My father as he slept, I had done't.</div>
                              <p>Enter MACBETH</p>
                              <div class="line">My husband!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">I have done the deed. Didst thou not hear a noise?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">I heard the owl scream and the crickets cry.</div>
                              <div class="line">Did not you speak?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">When?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Now.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">As I descended?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Hark!</div>
                              <div class="line">Who lies i' the second chamber?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Donalbain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">This is a sorry sight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Looking on his hands</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">A foolish thought, to say a sorry sight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">There's one did laugh in's sleep, and one cried</div>
                              <div class="line">'Murder!'</div>
                              <div class="line">That they did wake each other: I stood and heard them:</div>
                              <div class="line">But they did say their prayers, and address'd them</div>
                              <div class="line">Again to sleep.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">There are two lodged together.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">One cried 'God bless us!' and 'Amen' the other;</div>
                              <div class="line">As they had seen me with these hangman's hands.</div>
                              <div class="line">Listening their fear, I could not say 'Amen,'</div>
                              <div class="line">When they did say 'God bless us!'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Consider it not so deeply.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">But wherefore could not I pronounce 'Amen'?</div>
                              <div class="line">I had most need of blessing, and 'Amen'</div>
                              <div class="line">Stuck in my throat.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">These deeds must not be thought</div>
                              <div class="line">After these ways; so, it will make us mad.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Methought I heard a voice cry 'Sleep no more!</div>
                              <div class="line">Macbeth does murder sleep', the innocent sleep,</div>
                              <div class="line">Sleep that knits up the ravell'd sleeve of care,</div>
                              <div class="line">The death of each day's life, sore labour's bath,</div>
                              <div class="line">Balm of hurt minds, great nature's second course,</div>
                              <div class="line">Chief nourisher in life's feast,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">What do you mean?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Still it cried 'Sleep no more!' to all the house:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Glamis hath murder'd sleep, and therefore Cawdor</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall sleep no more; Macbeth shall sleep no more.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Who was it that thus cried? Why, worthy thane,</div>
                              <div class="line">You do unbend your noble strength, to think</div>
                              <div class="line">So brainsickly of things. Go get some water,</div>
                              <div class="line">And wash this filthy witness from your hand.</div>
                              <div class="line">Why did you bring these daggers from the place?</div>
                              <div class="line">They must lie there: go carry them; and smear</div>
                              <div class="line">The sleepy grooms with blood.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll go no more:</div>
                              <div class="line">I am afraid to think what I have done;</div>
                              <div class="line">Look on't again I dare not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Infirm of purpose!</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me the daggers: the sleeping and the dead</div>
                              <div class="line">Are but as pictures: 'tis the eye of childhood</div>
                              <div class="line">That fears a painted devil. If he do bleed,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll gild the faces of the grooms withal;</div>
                              <div class="line">For it must seem their guilt.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit. Knocking within</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Whence is that knocking?</div>
                              <div class="line">How is't with me, when every noise appals me?</div>
                              <div class="line">What hands are here? ha! they pluck out mine eyes.</div>
                              <div class="line">Will all great Neptune's ocean wash this blood</div>
                              <div class="line">Clean from my hand? No, this my hand will rather</div>
                              <div class="line">The multitudinous seas in incarnadine,</div>
                              <div class="line">Making the green one red.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter LADY MACBETH</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">My hands are of your colour; but I shame</div>
                              <div class="line">To wear a heart so white.</div>
                              <p>Knocking within</p>
                              <div class="line">I hear a knocking</div>
                              <div class="line">At the south entry: retire we to our chamber;</div>
                              <div class="line">A little water clears us of this deed:</div>
                              <div class="line">How easy is it, then! Your constancy</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath left you unattended.</div>
                              <p>Knocking within</p>
                              <div class="line">Hark! more knocking.</div>
                              <div class="line">Get on your nightgown, lest occasion call us,</div>
                              <div class="line">And show us to be watchers. Be not lost</div>
                              <div class="line">So poorly in your thoughts.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">To know my deed, 'twere best not know myself.</div>
                              <p>Knocking within</p>
                              <div class="line">Wake Duncan with thy knocking! I would thou couldst!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  The same.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Knocking within. Enter a Porter</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Porter</div>
                              <div class="line">Here's a knocking indeed! If a</div>
                              <div class="line">man were porter of hell-gate, he should have</div>
                              <div class="line">old turning the key.</div>
                              <p>Knocking within</p>
                              <div class="line">Knock,</div>
                              <div class="line">knock, knock! Who's there, i' the name of</div>
                              <div class="line">Beelzebub? Here's a farmer, that hanged</div>
                              <div class="line">himself on the expectation of plenty: come in</div>
                              <div class="line">time; have napkins enow about you; here</div>
                              <div class="line">you'll sweat for't.</div>
                              <p>Knocking within</p>
                              <div class="line">Knock,</div>
                              <div class="line">knock! Who's there, in the other devil's</div>
                              <div class="line">name? Faith, here's an equivocator, that could</div>
                              <div class="line">swear in both the scales against either scale;</div>
                              <div class="line">who committed treason enough for God's sake,</div>
                              <div class="line">yet could not equivocate to heaven: O, come</div>
                              <div class="line">in, equivocator.</div>
                              <p>Knocking within</p>
                              <div class="line">Knock,</div>
                              <div class="line">knock, knock! Who's there? Faith, here's an</div>
                              <div class="line">English tailor come hither, for stealing out of</div>
                              <div class="line">a French hose: come in, tailor; here you may</div>
                              <div class="line">roast your goose.</div>
                              <p>Knocking within</p>
                              <div class="line">Knock,</div>
                              <div class="line">knock; never at quiet! What are you? But</div>
                              <div class="line">this place is too cold for hell. I'll devil-porter</div>
                              <div class="line">it no further: I had thought to have let in</div>
                              <div class="line">some of all professions that go the primrose</div>
                              <div class="line">way to the everlasting bonfire.</div>
                              <p>Knocking within</p>
                              <div class="line">Anon, anon! I pray you, remember the porter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Opens the gate</p>
                        <p>Enter MACDUFF and LENNOX</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Was it so late, friend, ere you went to bed,</div>
                              <div class="line">That you do lie so late?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Porter</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith sir, we were carousing till the</div>
                              <div class="line">second cock: and drink, sir, is a great</div>
                              <div class="line">provoker of three things.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">What three things does drink especially provoke?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Porter</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, sir, nose-painting, sleep, and</div>
                              <div class="line">urine. Lechery, sir, it provokes, and unprovokes;</div>
                              <div class="line">it provokes the desire, but it takes</div>
                              <div class="line">away the performance: therefore, much drink</div>
                              <div class="line">may be said to be an equivocator with lechery:</div>
                              <div class="line">it makes him, and it mars him; it sets</div>
                              <div class="line">him on, and it takes him off; it persuades him,</div>
                              <div class="line">and disheartens him; makes him stand to, and</div>
                              <div class="line">not stand to; in conclusion, equivocates him</div>
                              <div class="line">in a sleep, and, giving him the lie, leaves him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I believe drink gave thee the lie last night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Porter</div>
                              <div class="line">That it did, sir, i' the very throat on</div>
                              <div class="line">me: but I requited him for his lie; and, I</div>
                              <div class="line">think, being too strong for him, though he took</div>
                              <div class="line">up my legs sometime, yet I made a shift to cast</div>
                              <div class="line">him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Is thy master stirring?</div>
                              <p>Enter MACBETH</p>
                              <div class="line">Our knocking has awaked him; here he comes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                              <div class="line">Good morrow, noble sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Good morrow, both.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Is the king stirring, worthy thane?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Not yet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">He did command me to call timely on him:</div>
                              <div class="line">I have almost slipp'd the hour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll bring you to him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I know this is a joyful trouble to you;</div>
                              <div class="line">But yet 'tis one.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">The labour we delight in physics pain.</div>
                              <div class="line">This is the door.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll make so bold to call,</div>
                              <div class="line">For 'tis my limited service.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                              <div class="line">Goes the king hence to-day?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">He does: he did appoint so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                              <div class="line">The night has been unruly: where we lay,</div>
                              <div class="line">Our chimneys were blown down; and, as they say,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lamentings heard i' the air; strange screams of death,</div>
                              <div class="line">And prophesying with accents terrible</div>
                              <div class="line">Of dire combustion and confused events</div>
                              <div class="line">New hatch'd to the woeful time: the obscure bird</div>
                              <div class="line">Clamour'd the livelong night: some say, the earth</div>
                              <div class="line">Was feverous and did shake.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twas a rough night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                              <div class="line">My young remembrance cannot parallel</div>
                              <div class="line">A fellow to it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter MACDUFF</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">O horror, horror, horror! Tongue nor heart</div>
                              <div class="line">Cannot conceive nor name thee!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                              <div class="line">What's the matter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Confusion now hath made his masterpiece!</div>
                              <div class="line">Most sacrilegious murder hath broke ope</div>
                              <div class="line">The Lord's anointed temple, and stole thence</div>
                              <div class="line">The life o' the building!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">What is 't you say? the life?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                              <div class="line">Mean you his majesty?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Approach the chamber, and destroy your sight</div>
                              <div class="line">With a new Gorgon: do not bid me speak;</div>
                              <div class="line">See, and then speak yourselves.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt MACBETH and LENNOX</p>
                              <div class="line">Awake, awake!</div>
                              <div class="line">Ring the alarum-bell. Murder and treason!</div>
                              <div class="line">Banquo and Donalbain! Malcolm! awake!</div>
                              <div class="line">Shake off this downy sleep, death's counterfeit,</div>
                              <div class="line">And look on death itself! up, up, and see</div>
                              <div class="line">The great doom's image! Malcolm! Banquo!</div>
                              <div class="line">As from your graves rise up, and walk like sprites,</div>
                              <div class="line">To countenance this horror! Ring the bell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Bell rings</p>
                        <p>Enter LADY MACBETH</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">What's the business,</div>
                              <div class="line">That such a hideous trumpet calls to parley</div>
                              <div class="line">The sleepers of the house? speak, speak!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">O gentle lady,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis not for you to hear what I can speak:</div>
                              <div class="line">The repetition, in a woman's ear,</div>
                              <div class="line">Would murder as it fell.</div>
                              <p>Enter BANQUO</p>
                              <div class="line">O Banquo, Banquo,</div>
                              <div class="line">Our royal master 's murder'd!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Woe, alas!</div>
                              <div class="line">What, in our house?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                              <div class="line">Too cruel any where.</div>
                              <div class="line">Dear Duff, I prithee, contradict thyself,</div>
                              <div class="line">And say it is not so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter MACBETH and LENNOX, with ROSS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Had I but died an hour before this chance,</div>
                              <div class="line">I had lived a blessed time; for, from this instant,</div>
                              <div class="line">There 's nothing serious in mortality:</div>
                              <div class="line">All is but toys: renown and grace is dead;</div>
                              <div class="line">The wine of life is drawn, and the mere lees</div>
                              <div class="line">Is left this vault to brag of.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter MALCOLM and DONALBAIN</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DONALBAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">What is amiss?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">You are, and do not know't:</div>
                              <div class="line">The spring, the head, the fountain of your blood</div>
                              <div class="line">Is stopp'd; the very source of it is stopp'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Your royal father 's murder'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                              <div class="line">O, by whom?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                              <div class="line">Those of his chamber, as it seem'd, had done 't:</div>
                              <div class="line">Their hands and faces were an badged with blood;</div>
                              <div class="line">So were their daggers, which unwiped we found</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon their pillows:</div>
                              <div class="line">They stared, and were distracted; no man's life</div>
                              <div class="line">Was to be trusted with them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">O, yet I do repent me of my fury,</div>
                              <div class="line">That I did kill them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
