                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherefore did you so?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Who can be wise, amazed, temperate and furious,</div>
                              <div class="line">Loyal and neutral, in a moment? No man:</div>
                              <div class="line">The expedition my violent love</div>
                              <div class="line">Outrun the pauser, reason. Here lay Duncan,</div>
                              <div class="line">His silver skin laced with his golden blood;</div>
                              <div class="line">And his gash'd stabs look'd like a breach in nature</div>
                              <div class="line">For ruin's wasteful entrance: there, the murderers,</div>
                              <div class="line">Steep'd in the colours of their trade, their daggers</div>
                              <div class="line">Unmannerly breech'd with gore: who could refrain,</div>
                              <div class="line">That had a heart to love, and in that heart</div>
                              <div class="line">Courage to make 's love known?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Help me hence, ho!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Look to the lady.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to DONALBAIN</span>  Why do we hold our tongues,</div>
                              <div class="line">That most may claim this argument for ours?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DONALBAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to MALCOLM</span>  What should be spoken here,</div>
                              <div class="line">where our fate,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hid in an auger-hole, may rush, and seize us?</div>
                              <div class="line">Let 's away;</div>
                              <div class="line">Our tears are not yet brew'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to DONALBAIN</span>        Nor our strong sorrow</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon the foot of motion.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                              <div class="line">Look to the lady:</div>
                              <p>LADY MACBETH is carried out</p>
                              <div class="line">And when we have our naked frailties hid,</div>
                              <div class="line">That suffer in exposure, let us meet,</div>
                              <div class="line">And question this most bloody piece of work,</div>
                              <div class="line">To know it further. Fears and scruples shake us:</div>
                              <div class="line">In the great hand of God I stand; and thence</div>
                              <div class="line">Against the undivulged pretence I fight</div>
                              <div class="line">Of treasonous malice.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">And so do I.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALL</div>
                              <div class="line">So all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's briefly put on manly readiness,</div>
                              <div class="line">And meet i' the hall together.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Well contented.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt all but Malcolm and Donalbain</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                              <div class="line">What will you do? Let's not consort with them:</div>
                              <div class="line">To show an unfelt sorrow is an office</div>
                              <div class="line">Which the false man does easy. I'll to England.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DONALBAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">To Ireland, I; our separated fortune</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall keep us both the safer: where we are,</div>
                              <div class="line">There's daggers in men's smiles: the near in blood,</div>
                              <div class="line">The nearer bloody.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                              <div class="line">This murderous shaft that's shot</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath not yet lighted, and our safest way</div>
                              <div class="line">Is to avoid the aim. Therefore, to horse;</div>
                              <div class="line">And let us not be dainty of leave-taking,</div>
                              <div class="line">But shift away: there's warrant in that theft</div>
                              <div class="line">Which steals itself, when there's no mercy left.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.5">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>4. SCENE IV.  Outside Macbeth's castle.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter ROSS and an old Man</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Man</div>
                              <div class="line">Threescore and ten I can remember well:</div>
                              <div class="line">Within the volume of which time I have seen</div>
                              <div class="line">Hours dreadful and things strange; but this sore night</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath trifled former knowings.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ah, good father,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou seest, the heavens, as troubled with man's act,</div>
                              <div class="line">Threaten his bloody stage: by the clock, 'tis day,</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet dark night strangles the travelling lamp:</div>
                              <div class="line">Is't night's predominance, or the day's shame,</div>
                              <div class="line">That darkness does the face of earth entomb,</div>
                              <div class="line">When living light should kiss it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Man</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis unnatural,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even like the deed that's done. On Tuesday last,</div>
                              <div class="line">A falcon, towering in her pride of place,</div>
                              <div class="line">Was by a mousing owl hawk'd at and kill'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                              <div class="line">And Duncan's horses--a thing most strange and certain--</div>
                              <div class="line">Beauteous and swift, the minions of their race,</div>
                              <div class="line">Turn'd wild in nature, broke their stalls, flung out,</div>
                              <div class="line">Contending 'gainst obedience, as they would make</div>
                              <div class="line">War with mankind.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Man</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis said they eat each other.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                              <div class="line">They did so, to the amazement of mine eyes</div>
                              <div class="line">That look'd upon't. Here comes the good Macduff.</div>
                              <p>Enter MACDUFF</p>
                              <div class="line">How goes the world, sir, now?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, see you not?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                              <div class="line">Is't known who did this more than bloody deed?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Those that Macbeth hath slain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, the day!</div>
                              <div class="line">What good could they pretend?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">They were suborn'd:</div>
                              <div class="line">Malcolm and Donalbain, the king's two sons,</div>
                              <div class="line">Are stol'n away and fled; which puts upon them</div>
                              <div class="line">Suspicion of the deed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Gainst nature still!</div>
                              <div class="line">Thriftless ambition, that wilt ravin up</div>
                              <div class="line">Thine own life's means! Then 'tis most like</div>
                              <div class="line">The sovereignty will fall upon Macbeth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">He is already named, and gone to Scone</div>
                              <div class="line">To be invested.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                              <div class="line">Where is Duncan's body?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Carried to Colmekill,</div>
                              <div class="line">The sacred storehouse of his predecessors,</div>
                              <div class="line">And guardian of their bones.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you to Scone?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">No, cousin, I'll to Fife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I will thither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, may you see things well done there: adieu!</div>
                              <div class="line">Lest our old robes sit easier than our new!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell, father.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Man</div>
                              <div class="line">God's benison go with you; and with those</div>
                              <div class="line">That would make good of bad, and friends of foes!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.5">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 3. ACT III</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.2">1. SCENE I.  Forres. The palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.3">2. SCENE II.  The palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.4">3. SCENE III.  A park near the palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.5">4. SCENE IV.  The same. Hall in the palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.6">5. SCENE V.  A Heath.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.7">6. SCENE VI.  Forres. The palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  Forres. The palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter BANQUO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast it now: king, Cawdor, Glamis, all,</div>
                              <div class="line">As the weird women promised, and, I fear,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou play'dst most foully for't: yet it was said</div>
                              <div class="line">It should not stand in thy posterity,</div>
                              <div class="line">But that myself should be the root and father</div>
                              <div class="line">Of many kings. If there come truth from them--</div>
                              <div class="line">As upon thee, Macbeth, their speeches shine--</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, by the verities on thee made good,</div>
                              <div class="line">May they not be my oracles as well,</div>
                              <div class="line">And set me up in hope? But hush! no more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Sennet sounded. Enter MACBETH, as king, LADY
MACBETH, as queen, LENNOX, ROSS, Lords, Ladies, and
Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Here's our chief guest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">If he had been forgotten,</div>
                              <div class="line">It had been as a gap in our great feast,</div>
                              <div class="line">And all-thing unbecoming.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">To-night we hold a solemn supper sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I'll request your presence.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                              <div class="line">Let your highness</div>
                              <div class="line">Command upon me; to the which my duties</div>
                              <div class="line">Are with a most indissoluble tie</div>
                              <div class="line">For ever knit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Ride you this afternoon?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, my good lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">We should have else desired your good advice,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which still hath been both grave and prosperous,</div>
                              <div class="line">In this day's council; but we'll take to-morrow.</div>
                              <div class="line">Is't far you ride?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                              <div class="line">As far, my lord, as will fill up the time</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twixt this and supper: go not my horse the better,</div>
                              <div class="line">I must become a borrower of the night</div>
                              <div class="line">For a dark hour or twain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Fail not our feast.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, I will not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">We hear, our bloody cousins are bestow'd</div>
                              <div class="line">In England and in Ireland, not confessing</div>
                              <div class="line">Their cruel parricide, filling their hearers</div>
                              <div class="line">With strange invention: but of that to-morrow,</div>
                              <div class="line">When therewithal we shall have cause of state</div>
                              <div class="line">Craving us jointly. Hie you to horse: adieu,</div>
                              <div class="line">Till you return at night. Goes Fleance with you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, my good lord: our time does call upon 's.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">I wish your horses swift and sure of foot;</div>
                              <div class="line">And so I do commend you to their backs. Farewell.</div>
                              <p>Exit BANQUO</p>
                              <div class="line">Let every man be master of his time</div>
                              <div class="line">Till seven at night: to make society</div>
                              <div class="line">The sweeter welcome, we will keep ourself</div>
                              <div class="line">Till supper-time alone: while then, God be with you!</div>
                              <p>Exeunt all but MACBETH, and an attendant</p>
                              <div class="line">Sirrah, a word with you: attend those men</div>
                              <div class="line">Our pleasure?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ATTENDANT</div>
                              <div class="line">They are, my lord, without the palace gate.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Bring them before us.</div>
                              <p>Exit Attendant</p>
                              <div class="line">To be thus is nothing;</div>
                              <div class="line">But to be safely thus.--Our fears in Banquo</div>
                              <div class="line">Stick deep; and in his royalty of nature</div>
                              <div class="line">Reigns that which would be fear'd: 'tis much he dares;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, to that dauntless temper of his mind,</div>
                              <div class="line">He hath a wisdom that doth guide his valour</div>
                              <div class="line">To act in safety. There is none but he</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose being I do fear: and, under him,</div>
                              <div class="line">My Genius is rebuked; as, it is said,</div>
                              <div class="line">Mark Antony's was by Caesar. He chid the sisters</div>
                              <div class="line">When first they put the name of king upon me,</div>
                              <div class="line">And bade them speak to him: then prophet-like</div>
                              <div class="line">They hail'd him father to a line of kings:</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon my head they placed a fruitless crown,</div>
                              <div class="line">And put a barren sceptre in my gripe,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thence to be wrench'd with an unlineal hand,</div>
                              <div class="line">No son of mine succeeding. If 't be so,</div>
                              <div class="line">For Banquo's issue have I filed my mind;</div>
                              <div class="line">For them the gracious Duncan have I murder'd;</div>
                              <div class="line">Put rancours in the vessel of my peace</div>
                              <div class="line">Only for them; and mine eternal jewel</div>
                              <div class="line">Given to the common enemy of man,</div>
                              <div class="line">To make them kings, the seed of Banquo kings!</div>
                              <div class="line">Rather than so, come fate into the list.</div>
                              <div class="line">And champion me to the utterance! Who's there!</div>
                              <p>Re-enter Attendant, with two Murderers</p>
                              <div class="line">Now go to the door, and stay there till we call.</div>
                              <p>Exit Attendant</p>
                              <div class="line">Was it not yesterday we spoke together?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">It was, so please your highness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Well then, now</div>
                              <div class="line">Have you consider'd of my speeches? Know</div>
                              <div class="line">That it was he in the times past which held you</div>
                              <div class="line">So under fortune, which you thought had been</div>
                              <div class="line">Our innocent self: this I made good to you</div>
                              <div class="line">In our last conference, pass'd in probation with you,</div>
                              <div class="line">How you were borne in hand, how cross'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">the instruments,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who wrought with them, and all things else that might</div>
                              <div class="line">To half a soul and to a notion crazed</div>
                              <div class="line">Say 'Thus did Banquo.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">You made it known to us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">I did so, and went further, which is now</div>
                              <div class="line">Our point of second meeting. Do you find</div>
                              <div class="line">Your patience so predominant in your nature</div>
                              <div class="line">That you can let this go? Are you so gospell'd</div>
                              <div class="line">To pray for this good man and for his issue,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose heavy hand hath bow'd you to the grave</div>
                              <div class="line">And beggar'd yours for ever?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">We are men, my liege.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, in the catalogue ye go for men;</div>
                              <div class="line">As hounds and greyhounds, mongrels, spaniels, curs,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shoughs, water-rugs and demi-wolves, are clept</div>
                              <div class="line">All by the name of dogs: the valued file</div>
                              <div class="line">Distinguishes the swift, the slow, the subtle,</div>
                              <div class="line">The housekeeper, the hunter, every one</div>
                              <div class="line">According to the gift which bounteous nature</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath in him closed; whereby he does receive</div>
                              <div class="line">Particular addition. from the bill</div>
                              <div class="line">That writes them all alike: and so of men.</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, if you have a station in the file,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not i' the worst rank of manhood, say 't;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I will put that business in your bosoms,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose execution takes your enemy off,</div>
                              <div class="line">Grapples you to the heart and love of us,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who wear our health but sickly in his life,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which in his death were perfect.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">I am one, my liege,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whom the vile blows and buffets of the world</div>
                              <div class="line">Have so incensed that I am reckless what</div>
                              <div class="line">I do to spite the world.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">And I another</div>
                              <div class="line">So weary with disasters, tugg'd with fortune,</div>
                              <div class="line">That I would set my lie on any chance,</div>
                              <div class="line">To mend it, or be rid on't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Both of you</div>
                              <div class="line">Know Banquo was your enemy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Both Murderers</div>
                              <div class="line">True, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">So is he mine; and in such bloody distance,</div>
                              <div class="line">That every minute of his being thrusts</div>
                              <div class="line">Against my near'st of life: and though I could</div>
                              <div class="line">With barefaced power sweep him from my sight</div>
                              <div class="line">And bid my will avouch it, yet I must not,</div>
                              <div class="line">For certain friends that are both his and mine,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose loves I may not drop, but wail his fall</div>
                              <div class="line">Who I myself struck down; and thence it is,</div>
                              <div class="line">That I to your assistance do make love,</div>
                              <div class="line">Masking the business from the common eye</div>
                              <div class="line">For sundry weighty reasons.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">We shall, my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Perform what you command us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">Though our lives--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Your spirits shine through you. Within this hour at most</div>
                              <div class="line">I will advise you where to plant yourselves;</div>
                              <div class="line">Acquaint you with the perfect spy o' the time,</div>
                              <div class="line">The moment on't; for't must be done to-night,</div>
                              <div class="line">And something from the palace; always thought</div>
                              <div class="line">That I require a clearness: and with him--</div>
                              <div class="line">To leave no rubs nor botches in the work--</div>
                              <div class="line">Fleance his son, that keeps him company,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose absence is no less material to me</div>
                              <div class="line">Than is his father's, must embrace the fate</div>
                              <div class="line">Of that dark hour. Resolve yourselves apart:</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll come to you anon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Both Murderers</div>
                              <div class="line">We are resolved, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll call upon you straight: abide within.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt Murderers</p>
                              <div class="line">It is concluded. Banquo, thy soul's flight,</div>
                              <div class="line">If it find heaven, must find it out to-night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  The palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter LADY MACBETH and a Servant</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Is Banquo gone from court?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, madam, but returns again to-night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Say to the king, I would attend his leisure</div>
                              <div class="line">For a few words.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, I will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Nought's had, all's spent,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where our desire is got without content:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis safer to be that which we destroy</div>
                              <div class="line">Than by destruction dwell in doubtful joy.</div>
                              <p>Enter MACBETH</p>
                              <div class="line">How now, my lord! why do you keep alone,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of sorriest fancies your companions making,</div>
                              <div class="line">Using those thoughts which should indeed have died</div>
                              <div class="line">With them they think on? Things without all remedy</div>
                              <div class="line">Should be without regard: what's done is done.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">We have scotch'd the snake, not kill'd it:</div>
                              <div class="line">She'll close and be herself, whilst our poor malice</div>
                              <div class="line">Remains in danger of her former tooth.</div>
                              <div class="line">But let the frame of things disjoint, both the</div>
                              <div class="line">worlds suffer,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ere we will eat our meal in fear and sleep</div>
                              <div class="line">In the affliction of these terrible dreams</div>
                              <div class="line">That shake us nightly: better be with the dead,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whom we, to gain our peace, have sent to peace,</div>
                              <div class="line">Than on the torture of the mind to lie</div>
                              <div class="line">In restless ecstasy. Duncan is in his grave;</div>
                              <div class="line">After life's fitful fever he sleeps well;</div>
                              <div class="line">Treason has done his worst: nor steel, nor poison,</div>
                              <div class="line">Malice domestic, foreign levy, nothing,</div>
                              <div class="line">Can touch him further.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Come on;</div>
                              <div class="line">Gentle my lord, sleek o'er your rugged looks;</div>
                              <div class="line">Be bright and jovial among your guests to-night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">So shall I, love; and so, I pray, be you:</div>
                              <div class="line">Let your remembrance apply to Banquo;</div>
                              <div class="line">Present him eminence, both with eye and tongue:</div>
                              <div class="line">Unsafe the while, that we</div>
                              <div class="line">Must lave our honours in these flattering streams,</div>
                              <div class="line">And make our faces vizards to our hearts,</div>
                              <div class="line">Disguising what they are.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">You must leave this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">O, full of scorpions is my mind, dear wife!</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou know'st that Banquo, and his Fleance, lives.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">But in them nature's copy's not eterne.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">There's comfort yet; they are assailable;</div>
                              <div class="line">Then be thou jocund: ere the bat hath flown</div>
                              <div class="line">His cloister'd flight, ere to black Hecate's summons</div>
                              <div class="line">The shard-borne beetle with his drowsy hums</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath rung night's yawning peal, there shall be done</div>
                              <div class="line">A deed of dreadful note.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">What's to be done?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Be innocent of the knowledge, dearest chuck,</div>
                              <div class="line">Till thou applaud the deed. Come, seeling night,</div>
                              <div class="line">Scarf up the tender eye of pitiful day;</div>
                              <div class="line">And with thy bloody and invisible hand</div>
                              <div class="line">Cancel and tear to pieces that great bond</div>
                              <div class="line">Which keeps me pale! Light thickens; and the crow</div>
                              <div class="line">Makes wing to the rooky wood:</div>
                              <div class="line">Good things of day begin to droop and drowse;</div>
                              <div class="line">While night's black agents to their preys do rouse.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou marvell'st at my words: but hold thee still;</div>
                              <div class="line">Things bad begun make strong themselves by ill.</div>
                              <div class="line">So, prithee, go with me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  A park near the palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter three Murderers</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">But who did bid thee join with us?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">Macbeth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">He needs not our mistrust, since he delivers</div>
                              <div class="line">Our offices and what we have to do</div>
                              <div class="line">To the direction just.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">Then stand with us.</div>
                              <div class="line">The west yet glimmers with some streaks of day:</div>
                              <div class="line">Now spurs the lated traveller apace</div>
                              <div class="line">To gain the timely inn; and near approaches</div>
                              <div class="line">The subject of our watch.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">Hark! I hear horses.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Give us a light there, ho!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">Then 'tis he: the rest</div>
                              <div class="line">That are within the note of expectation</div>
                              <div class="line">Already are i' the court.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">His horses go about.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">Almost a mile: but he does usually,</div>
                              <div class="line">So all men do, from hence to the palace gate</div>
                              <div class="line">Make it their walk.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">A light, a light!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter BANQUO, and FLEANCE with a torch</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis he.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand to't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                              <div class="line">It will be rain to-night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">Let it come down.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>They set upon BANQUO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BANQUO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, treachery! Fly, good Fleance, fly, fly, fly!</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou mayst revenge. O slave!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Dies. FLEANCE escapes</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">Who did strike out the light?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">Wast not the way?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">There's but one down; the son is fled.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">We have lost</div>
                              <div class="line">Best half of our affair.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, let's away, and say how much is done.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.5">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>4. SCENE IV.  The same. Hall in the palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>A banquet prepared. Enter MACBETH, LADY MACBETH,
ROSS, LENNOX, Lords, and Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">You know your own degrees; sit down: at first</div>
                              <div class="line">And last the hearty welcome.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Lords</div>
                              <div class="line">Thanks to your majesty.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Ourself will mingle with society,</div>
                              <div class="line">And play the humble host.</div>
                              <div class="line">Our hostess keeps her state, but in best time</div>
                              <div class="line">We will require her welcome.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Pronounce it for me, sir, to all our friends;</div>
                              <div class="line">For my heart speaks they are welcome.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>First Murderer appears at the door</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">See, they encounter thee with their hearts' thanks.</div>
                              <div class="line">Both sides are even: here I'll sit i' the midst:</div>
                              <div class="line">Be large in mirth; anon we'll drink a measure</div>
                              <div class="line">The table round.</div>
                              <p>Approaching the door</p>
                              <div class="line">There's blood on thy face.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis Banquo's then.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis better thee without than he within.</div>
                              <div class="line">Is he dispatch'd?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, his throat is cut; that I did for him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art the best o' the cut-throats: yet he's good</div>
                              <div class="line">That did the like for Fleance: if thou didst it,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art the nonpareil.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">Most royal sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">Fleance is 'scaped.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Then comes my fit again: I had else been perfect,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whole as the marble, founded as the rock,</div>
                              <div class="line">As broad and general as the casing air:</div>
                              <div class="line">But now I am cabin'd, cribb'd, confined, bound in</div>
                              <div class="line">To saucy doubts and fears. But Banquo's safe?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, my good lord: safe in a ditch he bides,</div>
                              <div class="line">With twenty trenched gashes on his head;</div>
                              <div class="line">The least a death to nature.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Thanks for that:</div>
                              <div class="line">There the grown serpent lies; the worm that's fled</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath nature that in time will venom breed,</div>
                              <div class="line">No teeth for the present. Get thee gone: to-morrow</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll hear, ourselves, again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit Murderer</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">My royal lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">You do not give the cheer: the feast is sold</div>
                              <div class="line">That is not often vouch'd, while 'tis a-making,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis given with welcome: to feed were best at home;</div>
                              <div class="line">From thence the sauce to meat is ceremony;</div>
                              <div class="line">Meeting were bare without it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet remembrancer!</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, good digestion wait on appetite,</div>
                              <div class="line">And health on both!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                              <div class="line">May't please your highness sit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>The GHOST OF BANQUO enters, and sits in
MACBETH's place</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Here had we now our country's honour roof'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Were the graced person of our Banquo present;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who may I rather challenge for unkindness</div>
                              <div class="line">Than pity for mischance!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                              <div class="line">His absence, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lays blame upon his promise. Please't your highness</div>
                              <div class="line">To grace us with your royal company.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">The table's full.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                              <div class="line">Here is a place reserved, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Where?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, my good lord. What is't that moves your highness?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Which of you have done this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Lords</div>
                              <div class="line">What, my good lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou canst not say I did it: never shake</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy gory locks at me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                              <div class="line">Gentlemen, rise: his highness is not well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Sit, worthy friends: my lord is often thus,</div>
                              <div class="line">And hath been from his youth: pray you, keep seat;</div>
                              <div class="line">The fit is momentary; upon a thought</div>
                              <div class="line">He will again be well: if much you note him,</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall offend him and extend his passion:</div>
                              <div class="line">Feed, and regard him not. Are you a man?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, and a bold one, that dare look on that</div>
                              <div class="line">Which might appal the devil.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">O proper stuff!</div>
                              <div class="line">This is the very painting of your fear:</div>
                              <div class="line">This is the air-drawn dagger which, you said,</div>
                              <div class="line">Led you to Duncan. O, these flaws and starts,</div>
                              <div class="line">Impostors to true fear, would well become</div>
                              <div class="line">A woman's story at a winter's fire,</div>
                              <div class="line">Authorized by her grandam. Shame itself!</div>
                              <div class="line">Why do you make such faces? When all's done,</div>
                              <div class="line">You look but on a stool.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, see there! behold! look! lo!</div>
                              <div class="line">how say you?</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, what care I? If thou canst nod, speak too.</div>
                              <div class="line">If charnel-houses and our graves must send</div>
                              <div class="line">Those that we bury back, our monuments</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall be the maws of kites.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>GHOST OF BANQUO vanishes</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">What, quite unmann'd in folly?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">If I stand here, I saw him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie, for shame!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Blood hath been shed ere now, i' the olden time,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ere human statute purged the gentle weal;</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, and since too, murders have been perform'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Too terrible for the ear: the times have been,</div>
                              <div class="line">That, when the brains were out, the man would die,</div>
                              <div class="line">And there an end; but now they rise again,</div>
                              <div class="line">With twenty mortal murders on their crowns,</div>
                              <div class="line">And push us from our stools: this is more strange</div>
                              <div class="line">Than such a murder is.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">My worthy lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Your noble friends do lack you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">I do forget.</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not muse at me, my most worthy friends,</div>
                              <div class="line">I have a strange infirmity, which is nothing</div>
                              <div class="line">To those that know me. Come, love and health to all;</div>
                              <div class="line">Then I'll sit down. Give me some wine; fill full.</div>
                              <div class="line">I drink to the general joy o' the whole table,</div>
                              <div class="line">And to our dear friend Banquo, whom we miss;</div>
                              <div class="line">Would he were here! to all, and him, we thirst,</div>
                              <div class="line">And all to all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Lords</div>
                              <div class="line">Our duties, and the pledge.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter GHOST OF BANQUO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Avaunt! and quit my sight! let the earth hide thee!</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy bones are marrowless, thy blood is cold;</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast no speculation in those eyes</div>
                              <div class="line">Which thou dost glare with!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Think of this, good peers,</div>
