                              <div class="line">But as a thing of custom: 'tis no other;</div>
                              <div class="line">Only it spoils the pleasure of the time.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">What man dare, I dare:</div>
                              <div class="line">Approach thou like the rugged Russian bear,</div>
                              <div class="line">The arm'd rhinoceros, or the Hyrcan tiger;</div>
                              <div class="line">Take any shape but that, and my firm nerves</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall never tremble: or be alive again,</div>
                              <div class="line">And dare me to the desert with thy sword;</div>
                              <div class="line">If trembling I inhabit then, protest me</div>
                              <div class="line">The baby of a girl. Hence, horrible shadow!</div>
                              <div class="line">Unreal mockery, hence!</div>
                              <p>GHOST OF BANQUO vanishes</p>
                              <div class="line">Why, so: being gone,</div>
                              <div class="line">I am a man again. Pray you, sit still.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">You have displaced the mirth, broke the good meeting,</div>
                              <div class="line">With most admired disorder.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Can such things be,</div>
                              <div class="line">And overcome us like a summer's cloud,</div>
                              <div class="line">Without our special wonder? You make me strange</div>
                              <div class="line">Even to the disposition that I owe,</div>
                              <div class="line">When now I think you can behold such sights,</div>
                              <div class="line">And keep the natural ruby of your cheeks,</div>
                              <div class="line">When mine is blanched with fear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                              <div class="line">What sights, my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, speak not; he grows worse and worse;</div>
                              <div class="line">Question enrages him. At once, good night:</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand not upon the order of your going,</div>
                              <div class="line">But go at once.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                              <div class="line">Good night; and better health</div>
                              <div class="line">Attend his majesty!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">A kind good night to all!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt all but MACBETH and LADY MACBETH</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">It will have blood; they say, blood will have blood:</div>
                              <div class="line">Stones have been known to move and trees to speak;</div>
                              <div class="line">Augurs and understood relations have</div>
                              <div class="line">By magot-pies and choughs and rooks brought forth</div>
                              <div class="line">The secret'st man of blood. What is the night?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Almost at odds with morning, which is which.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">How say'st thou, that Macduff denies his person</div>
                              <div class="line">At our great bidding?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Did you send to him, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">I hear it by the way; but I will send:</div>
                              <div class="line">There's not a one of them but in his house</div>
                              <div class="line">I keep a servant fee'd. I will to-morrow,</div>
                              <div class="line">And betimes I will, to the weird sisters:</div>
                              <div class="line">More shall they speak; for now I am bent to know,</div>
                              <div class="line">By the worst means, the worst. For mine own good,</div>
                              <div class="line">All causes shall give way: I am in blood</div>
                              <div class="line">Stepp'd in so far that, should I wade no more,</div>
                              <div class="line">Returning were as tedious as go o'er:</div>
                              <div class="line">Strange things I have in head, that will to hand;</div>
                              <div class="line">Which must be acted ere they may be scann'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">You lack the season of all natures, sleep.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, we'll to sleep. My strange and self-abuse</div>
                              <div class="line">Is the initiate fear that wants hard use:</div>
                              <div class="line">We are yet but young in deed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.6">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>5. SCENE V.  A Heath.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Thunder. Enter the three Witches meeting HECATE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Witch</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, how now, Hecate! you look angerly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECATE</div>
                              <div class="line">Have I not reason, beldams as you are,</div>
                              <div class="line">Saucy and overbold? How did you dare</div>
                              <div class="line">To trade and traffic with Macbeth</div>
                              <div class="line">In riddles and affairs of death;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I, the mistress of your charms,</div>
                              <div class="line">The close contriver of all harms,</div>
                              <div class="line">Was never call'd to bear my part,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or show the glory of our art?</div>
                              <div class="line">And, which is worse, all you have done</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath been but for a wayward son,</div>
                              <div class="line">Spiteful and wrathful, who, as others do,</div>
                              <div class="line">Loves for his own ends, not for you.</div>
                              <div class="line">But make amends now: get you gone,</div>
                              <div class="line">And at the pit of Acheron</div>
                              <div class="line">Meet me i' the morning: thither he</div>
                              <div class="line">Will come to know his destiny:</div>
                              <div class="line">Your vessels and your spells provide,</div>
                              <div class="line">Your charms and every thing beside.</div>
                              <div class="line">I am for the air; this night I'll spend</div>
                              <div class="line">Unto a dismal and a fatal end:</div>
                              <div class="line">Great business must be wrought ere noon:</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon the corner of the moon</div>
                              <div class="line">There hangs a vaporous drop profound;</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll catch it ere it come to ground:</div>
                              <div class="line">And that distill'd by magic sleights</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall raise such artificial sprites</div>
                              <div class="line">As by the strength of their illusion</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall draw him on to his confusion:</div>
                              <div class="line">He shall spurn fate, scorn death, and bear</div>
                              <div class="line">He hopes 'bove wisdom, grace and fear:</div>
                              <div class="line">And you all know, security</div>
                              <div class="line">Is mortals' chiefest enemy.</div>
                              <p>Music and a song within: 'Come away, come
away,' &c</p>
                              <div class="line">Hark! I am call'd; my little spirit, see,</div>
                              <div class="line">Sits in a foggy cloud, and stays for me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Witch</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, let's make haste; she'll soon be back again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.7">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>6. SCENE VI.  Forres. The palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter LENNOX and another Lord</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                              <div class="line">My former speeches have but hit your thoughts,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which can interpret further: only, I say,</div>
                              <div class="line">Things have been strangely borne. The</div>
                              <div class="line">gracious Duncan</div>
                              <div class="line">Was pitied of Macbeth: marry, he was dead:</div>
                              <div class="line">And the right-valiant Banquo walk'd too late;</div>
                              <div class="line">Whom, you may say, if't please you, Fleance kill'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">For Fleance fled: men must not walk too late.</div>
                              <div class="line">Who cannot want the thought how monstrous</div>
                              <div class="line">It was for Malcolm and for Donalbain</div>
                              <div class="line">To kill their gracious father? damned fact!</div>
                              <div class="line">How it did grieve Macbeth! did he not straight</div>
                              <div class="line">In pious rage the two delinquents tear,</div>
                              <div class="line">That were the slaves of drink and thralls of sleep?</div>
                              <div class="line">Was not that nobly done? Ay, and wisely too;</div>
                              <div class="line">For 'twould have anger'd any heart alive</div>
                              <div class="line">To hear the men deny't. So that, I say,</div>
                              <div class="line">He has borne all things well: and I do think</div>
                              <div class="line">That had he Duncan's sons under his key--</div>
                              <div class="line">As, an't please heaven, he shall not--they</div>
                              <div class="line">should find</div>
                              <div class="line">What 'twere to kill a father; so should Fleance.</div>
                              <div class="line">But, peace! for from broad words and 'cause he fail'd</div>
                              <div class="line">His presence at the tyrant's feast, I hear</div>
                              <div class="line">Macduff lives in disgrace: sir, can you tell</div>
                              <div class="line">Where he bestows himself?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">The son of Duncan,</div>
                              <div class="line">From whom this tyrant holds the due of birth</div>
                              <div class="line">Lives in the English court, and is received</div>
                              <div class="line">Of the most pious Edward with such grace</div>
                              <div class="line">That the malevolence of fortune nothing</div>
                              <div class="line">Takes from his high respect: thither Macduff</div>
                              <div class="line">Is gone to pray the holy king, upon his aid</div>
                              <div class="line">To wake Northumberland and warlike Siward:</div>
                              <div class="line">That, by the help of these--with Him above</div>
                              <div class="line">To ratify the work--we may again</div>
                              <div class="line">Give to our tables meat, sleep to our nights,</div>
                              <div class="line">Free from our feasts and banquets bloody knives,</div>
                              <div class="line">Do faithful homage and receive free honours:</div>
                              <div class="line">All which we pine for now: and this report</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath so exasperate the king that he</div>
                              <div class="line">Prepares for some attempt of war.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                              <div class="line">Sent he to Macduff?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">He did: and with an absolute 'Sir, not I,'</div>
                              <div class="line">The cloudy messenger turns me his back,</div>
                              <div class="line">And hums, as who should say 'You'll rue the time</div>
                              <div class="line">That clogs me with this answer.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                              <div class="line">And that well might</div>
                              <div class="line">Advise him to a caution, to hold what distance</div>
                              <div class="line">His wisdom can provide. Some holy angel</div>
                              <div class="line">Fly to the court of England and unfold</div>
                              <div class="line">His message ere he come, that a swift blessing</div>
                              <div class="line">May soon return to this our suffering country</div>
                              <div class="line">Under a hand accursed!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll send my prayers with him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.6">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 4. ACT IV</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.2">1. SCENE I.  A cavern. In the middle, a boiling cauldron.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.3">2. SCENE II.  Fife. Macduff's castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.4">3. SCENE III.  England. Before the King's palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  A cavern. In the middle, a boiling cauldron.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Thunder. Enter the three Witches</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Witch</div>
                              <div class="line">Thrice the brinded cat hath mew'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Witch</div>
                              <div class="line">Thrice and once the hedge-pig whined.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Witch</div>
                              <div class="line">Harpier cries 'Tis time, 'tis time.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Witch</div>
                              <div class="line">Round about the cauldron go;</div>
                              <div class="line">In the poison'd entrails throw.</div>
                              <div class="line">Toad, that under cold stone</div>
                              <div class="line">Days and nights has thirty-one</div>
                              <div class="line">Swelter'd venom sleeping got,</div>
                              <div class="line">Boil thou first i' the charmed pot.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Double, double toil and trouble;</div>
                              <div class="line">Fire burn, and cauldron bubble.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Witch</div>
                              <div class="line">Fillet of a fenny snake,</div>
                              <div class="line">In the cauldron boil and bake;</div>
                              <div class="line">Eye of newt and toe of frog,</div>
                              <div class="line">Wool of bat and tongue of dog,</div>
                              <div class="line">Adder's fork and blind-worm's sting,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lizard's leg and owlet's wing,</div>
                              <div class="line">For a charm of powerful trouble,</div>
                              <div class="line">Like a hell-broth boil and bubble.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Double, double toil and trouble;</div>
                              <div class="line">Fire burn and cauldron bubble.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Witch</div>
                              <div class="line">Scale of dragon, tooth of wolf,</div>
                              <div class="line">Witches' mummy, maw and gulf</div>
                              <div class="line">Of the ravin'd salt-sea shark,</div>
                              <div class="line">Root of hemlock digg'd i' the dark,</div>
                              <div class="line">Liver of blaspheming Jew,</div>
                              <div class="line">Gall of goat, and slips of yew</div>
                              <div class="line">Silver'd in the moon's eclipse,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nose of Turk and Tartar's lips,</div>
                              <div class="line">Finger of birth-strangled babe</div>
                              <div class="line">Ditch-deliver'd by a drab,</div>
                              <div class="line">Make the gruel thick and slab:</div>
                              <div class="line">Add thereto a tiger's chaudron,</div>
                              <div class="line">For the ingredients of our cauldron.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Double, double toil and trouble;</div>
                              <div class="line">Fire burn and cauldron bubble.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Witch</div>
                              <div class="line">Cool it with a baboon's blood,</div>
                              <div class="line">Then the charm is firm and good.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter HECATE to the other three Witches</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECATE</div>
                              <div class="line">O well done! I commend your pains;</div>
                              <div class="line">And every one shall share i' the gains;</div>
                              <div class="line">And now about the cauldron sing,</div>
                              <div class="line">Live elves and fairies in a ring,</div>
                              <div class="line">Enchanting all that you put in.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Music and a song: 'Black spirits,' &c</p>
                        <p>HECATE retires</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Witch</div>
                              <div class="line">By the pricking of my thumbs,</div>
                              <div class="line">Something wicked this way comes.</div>
                              <div class="line">Open, locks,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whoever knocks!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter MACBETH</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, you secret, black, and midnight hags!</div>
                              <div class="line">What is't you do?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALL</div>
                              <div class="line">A deed without a name.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">I conjure you, by that which you profess,</div>
                              <div class="line">Howe'er you come to know it, answer me:</div>
                              <div class="line">Though you untie the winds and let them fight</div>
                              <div class="line">Against the churches; though the yesty waves</div>
                              <div class="line">Confound and swallow navigation up;</div>
                              <div class="line">Though bladed corn be lodged and trees blown down;</div>
                              <div class="line">Though castles topple on their warders' heads;</div>
                              <div class="line">Though palaces and pyramids do slope</div>
                              <div class="line">Their heads to their foundations; though the treasure</div>
                              <div class="line">Of nature's germens tumble all together,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even till destruction sicken; answer me</div>
                              <div class="line">To what I ask you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Witch</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Witch</div>
                              <div class="line">Demand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Witch</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll answer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Witch</div>
                              <div class="line">Say, if thou'dst rather hear it from our mouths,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or from our masters?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Call 'em; let me see 'em.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Witch</div>
                              <div class="line">Pour in sow's blood, that hath eaten</div>
                              <div class="line">Her nine farrow; grease that's sweaten</div>
                              <div class="line">From the murderer's gibbet throw</div>
                              <div class="line">Into the flame.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, high or low;</div>
                              <div class="line">Thyself and office deftly show!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Thunder. First Apparition: an armed Head</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell me, thou unknown power,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Witch</div>
                              <div class="line">He knows thy thought:</div>
                              <div class="line">Hear his speech, but say thou nought.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Apparition</div>
                              <div class="line">Macbeth! Macbeth! Macbeth! beware Macduff;</div>
                              <div class="line">Beware the thane of Fife. Dismiss me. Enough.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Descends</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Whate'er thou art, for thy good caution, thanks;</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast harp'd my fear aright: but one</div>
                              <div class="line">word more,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Witch</div>
                              <div class="line">He will not be commanded: here's another,</div>
                              <div class="line">More potent than the first.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Thunder. Second Apparition: A bloody Child</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Apparition</div>
                              <div class="line">Macbeth! Macbeth! Macbeth!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Had I three ears, I'ld hear thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Apparition</div>
                              <div class="line">Be bloody, bold, and resolute; laugh to scorn</div>
                              <div class="line">The power of man, for none of woman born</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall harm Macbeth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Descends</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Then live, Macduff: what need I fear of thee?</div>
                              <div class="line">But yet I'll make assurance double sure,</div>
                              <div class="line">And take a bond of fate: thou shalt not live;</div>
                              <div class="line">That I may tell pale-hearted fear it lies,</div>
                              <div class="line">And sleep in spite of thunder.</div>
                              <p>Thunder. Third Apparition: a Child crowned,
with a tree in his hand</p>
                              <div class="line">What is this</div>
                              <div class="line">That rises like the issue of a king,</div>
                              <div class="line">And wears upon his baby-brow the round</div>
                              <div class="line">And top of sovereignty?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Listen, but speak not to't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Apparition</div>
                              <div class="line">Be lion-mettled, proud; and take no care</div>
                              <div class="line">Who chafes, who frets, or where conspirers are:</div>
                              <div class="line">Macbeth shall never vanquish'd be until</div>
                              <div class="line">Great Birnam wood to high Dunsinane hill</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall come against him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Descends</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">That will never be</div>
                              <div class="line">Who can impress the forest, bid the tree</div>
                              <div class="line">Unfix his earth-bound root? Sweet bodements! good!</div>
                              <div class="line">Rebellion's head, rise never till the wood</div>
                              <div class="line">Of Birnam rise, and our high-placed Macbeth</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall live the lease of nature, pay his breath</div>
                              <div class="line">To time and mortal custom. Yet my heart</div>
                              <div class="line">Throbs to know one thing: tell me, if your art</div>
                              <div class="line">Can tell so much: shall Banquo's issue ever</div>
                              <div class="line">Reign in this kingdom?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Seek to know no more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">I will be satisfied: deny me this,</div>
                              <div class="line">And an eternal curse fall on you! Let me know.</div>
                              <div class="line">Why sinks that cauldron? and what noise is this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Hautboys</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Witch</div>
                              <div class="line">Show!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Witch</div>
                              <div class="line">Show!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Witch</div>
                              <div class="line">Show!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Show his eyes, and grieve his heart;</div>
                              <div class="line">Come like shadows, so depart!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>A show of Eight Kings, the last with a glass in
his hand; GHOST OF BANQUO following</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art too like the spirit of Banquo: down!</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy crown does sear mine eye-balls. And thy hair,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou other gold-bound brow, is like the first.</div>
                              <div class="line">A third is like the former. Filthy hags!</div>
                              <div class="line">Why do you show me this? A fourth! Start, eyes!</div>
                              <div class="line">What, will the line stretch out to the crack of doom?</div>
                              <div class="line">Another yet! A seventh! I'll see no more:</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet the eighth appears, who bears a glass</div>
                              <div class="line">Which shows me many more; and some I see</div>
                              <div class="line">That two-fold balls and treble scepters carry:</div>
                              <div class="line">Horrible sight! Now, I see, 'tis true;</div>
                              <div class="line">For the blood-bolter'd Banquo smiles upon me,</div>
                              <div class="line">And points at them for his.</div>
                              <p>Apparitions vanish</p>
                              <div class="line">What, is this so?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Witch</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, sir, all this is so: but why</div>
                              <div class="line">Stands Macbeth thus amazedly?</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, sisters, cheer we up his sprites,</div>
                              <div class="line">And show the best of our delights:</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll charm the air to give a sound,</div>
                              <div class="line">While you perform your antic round:</div>
                              <div class="line">That this great king may kindly say,</div>
                              <div class="line">Our duties did his welcome pay.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Music. The witches dance and then vanish,
with HECATE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Where are they? Gone? Let this pernicious hour</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand aye accursed in the calendar!</div>
                              <div class="line">Come in, without there!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter LENNOX</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                              <div class="line">What's your grace's will?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Saw you the weird sisters?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                              <div class="line">No, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Came they not by you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                              <div class="line">No, indeed, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Infected be the air whereon they ride;</div>
                              <div class="line">And damn'd all those that trust them! I did hear</div>
                              <div class="line">The galloping of horse: who was't came by?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis two or three, my lord, that bring you word</div>
                              <div class="line">Macduff is fled to England.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Fled to England!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LENNOX</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, my good lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACBETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Time, thou anticipatest my dread exploits:</div>
                              <div class="line">The flighty purpose never is o'ertook</div>
                              <div class="line">Unless the deed go with it; from this moment</div>
                              <div class="line">The very firstlings of my heart shall be</div>
                              <div class="line">The firstlings of my hand. And even now,</div>
                              <div class="line">To crown my thoughts with acts, be it thought and done:</div>
                              <div class="line">The castle of Macduff I will surprise;</div>
                              <div class="line">Seize upon Fife; give to the edge o' the sword</div>
                              <div class="line">His wife, his babes, and all unfortunate souls</div>
                              <div class="line">That trace him in his line. No boasting like a fool;</div>
                              <div class="line">This deed I'll do before this purpose cool.</div>
                              <div class="line">But no more sights!--Where are these gentlemen?</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, bring me where they are.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  Fife. Macduff's castle.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter LADY MACDUFF, her Son, and ROSS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">What had he done, to make him fly the land?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                              <div class="line">You must have patience, madam.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">He had none:</div>
                              <div class="line">His flight was madness: when our actions do not,</div>
                              <div class="line">Our fears do make us traitors.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                              <div class="line">You know not</div>
                              <div class="line">Whether it was his wisdom or his fear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Wisdom! to leave his wife, to leave his babes,</div>
                              <div class="line">His mansion and his titles in a place</div>
                              <div class="line">From whence himself does fly? He loves us not;</div>
                              <div class="line">He wants the natural touch: for the poor wren,</div>
                              <div class="line">The most diminutive of birds, will fight,</div>
                              <div class="line">Her young ones in her nest, against the owl.</div>
                              <div class="line">All is the fear and nothing is the love;</div>
                              <div class="line">As little is the wisdom, where the flight</div>
                              <div class="line">So runs against all reason.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                              <div class="line">My dearest coz,</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, school yourself: but for your husband,</div>
                              <div class="line">He is noble, wise, judicious, and best knows</div>
                              <div class="line">The fits o' the season. I dare not speak</div>
                              <div class="line">much further;</div>
                              <div class="line">But cruel are the times, when we are traitors</div>
                              <div class="line">And do not know ourselves, when we hold rumour</div>
                              <div class="line">From what we fear, yet know not what we fear,</div>
                              <div class="line">But float upon a wild and violent sea</div>
                              <div class="line">Each way and move. I take my leave of you:</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall not be long but I'll be here again:</div>
                              <div class="line">Things at the worst will cease, or else climb upward</div>
                              <div class="line">To what they were before. My pretty cousin,</div>
                              <div class="line">Blessing upon you!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Father'd he is, and yet he's fatherless.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSS</div>
                              <div class="line">I am so much a fool, should I stay longer,</div>
                              <div class="line">It would be my disgrace and your discomfort:</div>
                              <div class="line">I take my leave at once.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Sirrah, your father's dead;</div>
                              <div class="line">And what will you do now? How will you live?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Son</div>
                              <div class="line">As birds do, mother.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">What, with worms and flies?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Son</div>
                              <div class="line">With what I get, I mean; and so do they.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Poor bird! thou'ldst never fear the net nor lime,</div>
                              <div class="line">The pitfall nor the gin.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Son</div>
                              <div class="line">Why should I, mother? Poor birds they are not set for.</div>
                              <div class="line">My father is not dead, for all your saying.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, he is dead; how wilt thou do for a father?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Son</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, how will you do for a husband?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, I can buy me twenty at any market.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Son</div>
                              <div class="line">Then you'll buy 'em to sell again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou speak'st with all thy wit: and yet, i' faith,</div>
                              <div class="line">With wit enough for thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Son</div>
                              <div class="line">Was my father a traitor, mother?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, that he was.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Son</div>
                              <div class="line">What is a traitor?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, one that swears and lies.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Son</div>
                              <div class="line">And be all traitors that do so?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Every one that does so is a traitor, and must be hanged.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Son</div>
                              <div class="line">And must they all be hanged that swear and lie?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Every one.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Son</div>
                              <div class="line">Who must hang them?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, the honest men.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Son</div>
                              <div class="line">Then the liars and swearers are fools,</div>
                              <div class="line">for there are liars and swearers enow to beat</div>
                              <div class="line">the honest men and hang up them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, God help thee, poor monkey!</div>
                              <div class="line">But how wilt thou do for a father?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Son</div>
                              <div class="line">If he were dead, you'ld weep for</div>
                              <div class="line">him: if you would not, it were a good sign</div>
                              <div class="line">that I should quickly have a new father.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Poor prattler, how thou talk'st!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter a Messenger</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">Bless you, fair dame! I am not to you known,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though in your state of honour I am perfect.</div>
                              <div class="line">I doubt some danger does approach you nearly:</div>
                              <div class="line">If you will take a homely man's advice,</div>
                              <div class="line">Be not found here; hence, with your little ones.</div>
                              <div class="line">To fright you thus, methinks, I am too savage;</div>
                              <div class="line">To do worse to you were fell cruelty,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which is too nigh your person. Heaven preserve you!</div>
                              <div class="line">I dare abide no longer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Whither should I fly?</div>
                              <div class="line">I have done no harm. But I remember now</div>
                              <div class="line">I am in this earthly world; where to do harm</div>
                              <div class="line">Is often laudable, to do good sometime</div>
                              <div class="line">Accounted dangerous folly: why then, alas,</div>
                              <div class="line">Do I put up that womanly defence,</div>
                              <div class="line">To say I have done no harm?</div>
                              <p>Enter Murderers</p>
                              <div class="line">What are these faces?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">Where is your husband?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I hope, in no place so unsanctified</div>
                              <div class="line">Where such as thou mayst find him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">He's a traitor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Son</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou liest, thou shag-hair'd villain!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Murderer</div>
                              <div class="line">What, you egg!</div>
                              <p>Stabbing him</p>
                              <div class="line">Young fry of treachery!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Son</div>
                              <div class="line">He has kill'd me, mother:</div>
                              <div class="line">Run away, I pray you!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Dies</p>
                        <p>Exit LADY MACDUFF, crying 'Murder!' Exeunt
Murderers, following her</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  England. Before the King's palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter MALCOLM and MACDUFF</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                              <div class="line">Let us seek out some desolate shade, and there</div>
                              <div class="line">Weep our sad bosoms empty.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Let us rather</div>
                              <div class="line">Hold fast the mortal sword, and like good men</div>
                              <div class="line">Bestride our down-fall'n birthdom: each new morn</div>
                              <div class="line">New widows howl, new orphans cry, new sorrows</div>
                              <div class="line">Strike heaven on the face, that it resounds</div>
                              <div class="line">As if it felt with Scotland and yell'd out</div>
                              <div class="line">Like syllable of dolour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                              <div class="line">What I believe I'll wail,</div>
                              <div class="line">What know believe, and what I can redress,</div>
                              <div class="line">As I shall find the time to friend, I will.</div>
                              <div class="line">What you have spoke, it may be so perchance.</div>
                              <div class="line">This tyrant, whose sole name blisters our tongues,</div>
                              <div class="line">Was once thought honest: you have loved him well.</div>
                              <div class="line">He hath not touch'd you yet. I am young;</div>
                              <div class="line">but something</div>
                              <div class="line">You may deserve of him through me, and wisdom</div>
                              <div class="line">To offer up a weak poor innocent lamb</div>
                              <div class="line">To appease an angry god.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I am not treacherous.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                              <div class="line">But Macbeth is.</div>
                              <div class="line">A good and virtuous nature may recoil</div>
                              <div class="line">In an imperial charge. But I shall crave</div>
                              <div class="line">your pardon;</div>
                              <div class="line">That which you are my thoughts cannot transpose:</div>
                              <div class="line">Angels are bright still, though the brightest fell;</div>
                              <div class="line">Though all things foul would wear the brows of grace,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet grace must still look so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I have lost my hopes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                              <div class="line">Perchance even there where I did find my doubts.</div>
                              <div class="line">Why in that rawness left you wife and child,</div>
                              <div class="line">Those precious motives, those strong knots of love,</div>
                              <div class="line">Without leave-taking? I pray you,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let not my jealousies be your dishonours,</div>
                              <div class="line">But mine own safeties. You may be rightly just,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whatever I shall think.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Bleed, bleed, poor country!</div>
                              <div class="line">Great tyranny! lay thou thy basis sure,</div>
                              <div class="line">For goodness dare not cheque thee: wear thou</div>
                              <div class="line">thy wrongs;</div>
                              <div class="line">The title is affeer'd! Fare thee well, lord:</div>
                              <div class="line">I would not be the villain that thou think'st</div>
                              <div class="line">For the whole space that's in the tyrant's grasp,</div>
                              <div class="line">And the rich East to boot.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                              <div class="line">Be not offended:</div>
                              <div class="line">I speak not as in absolute fear of you.</div>
                              <div class="line">I think our country sinks beneath the yoke;</div>
                              <div class="line">It weeps, it bleeds; and each new day a gash</div>
                              <div class="line">Is added to her wounds: I think withal</div>
                              <div class="line">There would be hands uplifted in my right;</div>
                              <div class="line">And here from gracious England have I offer</div>
                              <div class="line">Of goodly thousands: but, for all this,</div>
                              <div class="line">When I shall tread upon the tyrant's head,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or wear it on my sword, yet my poor country</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall have more vices than it had before,</div>
                              <div class="line">More suffer and more sundry ways than ever,</div>
                              <div class="line">By him that shall succeed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">What should he be?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                              <div class="line">It is myself I mean: in whom I know</div>
                              <div class="line">All the particulars of vice so grafted</div>
                              <div class="line">That, when they shall be open'd, black Macbeth</div>
                              <div class="line">Will seem as pure as snow, and the poor state</div>
                              <div class="line">Esteem him as a lamb, being compared</div>
                              <div class="line">With my confineless harms.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Not in the legions</div>
                              <div class="line">Of horrid hell can come a devil more damn'd</div>
                              <div class="line">In evils to top Macbeth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MALCOLM</div>
                              <div class="line">I grant him bloody,</div>
                              <div class="line">Luxurious, avaricious, false, deceitful,</div>
                              <div class="line">Sudden, malicious, smacking of every sin</div>
                              <div class="line">That has a name: but there's no bottom, none,</div>
                              <div class="line">In my voluptuousness: your wives, your daughters,</div>
                              <div class="line">Your matrons and your maids, could not fill up</div>
                              <div class="line">The cistern of my lust, and my desire</div>
                              <div class="line">All continent impediments would o'erbear</div>
                              <div class="line">That did oppose my will: better Macbeth</div>
                              <div class="line">Than such an one to reign.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MACDUFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Boundless intemperance</div>
                              <div class="line">In nature is a tyranny; it hath been</div>
                              <div class="line">The untimely emptying of the happy throne</div>
                              <div class="line">And fall of many kings. But fear not yet</div>
                              <div class="line">To take upon you what is yours: you may</div>
                              <div class="line">Convey your pleasures in a spacious plenty,</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet seem cold, the time you may so hoodwink.</div>
                              <div class="line">We have willing dames enough: there cannot be</div>
